135 template<class T>
136 optional<T> maybe_id( const string& name_or_id )
137 {
138  if( std::isdigit( name_or_id.front() ) )
139  {
140  try
141  {
142  return fc::variant(name_or_id, 1).as<T>(1);
143  }
144  catch (const fc::exception&)
145  { // not an ID
146  }
147  }
148  return optional<T>();
149 }

151 string address_to_shorthash( const address& addr )
152 {
153  uint32_t x = addr.addr._hash[0];
154  static const char hd[] = "0123456789abcdef";
155  string result;
156 
157  result += hd[(x >> 0x1c) & 0x0f];
158  result += hd[(x >> 0x18) & 0x0f];
159  result += hd[(x >> 0x14) & 0x0f];
160  result += hd[(x >> 0x10) & 0x0f];
161  result += hd[(x >> 0x0c) & 0x0f];
162  result += hd[(x >> 0x08) & 0x0f];
163  result += hd[(x >> 0x04) & 0x0f];
164  result += hd[(x ) & 0x0f];
165 
166  return result;
167 }

169 fc::ecc::private_key derive_private_key( const std::string& prefix_string,
170  int sequence_number )
171 {
172  std::string sequence_string = std::to_string(sequence_number);
173  fc::sha512 h = fc::sha512::hash(prefix_string + " " + sequence_string);
174  fc::ecc::private_key derived_key = fc::ecc::private_key::regenerate(fc::sha256::hash(h));
175  return derived_key;
176 }

178 string normalize_brain_key( string s )
179 {
180  size_t i = 0, n = s.length();
181  std::string result;
182  char c;
183  result.reserve( n );
184 
185  bool preceded_by_whitespace = false;
186  bool non_empty = false;
187  while( i < n )
188  {
189  c = s[i++];
190  switch( c )
191  {
192  case ' ': case '\t': case '\r': case '\n': case '\v': case '\f':
193  preceded_by_whitespace = true;
194  continue;
195 
196  case 'a': c = 'A'; break;
197  case 'b': c = 'B'; break;
198  case 'c': c = 'C'; break;
199  case 'd': c = 'D'; break;
200  case 'e': c = 'E'; break;
201  case 'f': c = 'F'; break;
202  case 'g': c = 'G'; break;
203  case 'h': c = 'H'; break;
204  case 'i': c = 'I'; break;
205  case 'j': c = 'J'; break;
206  case 'k': c = 'K'; break;
207  case 'l': c = 'L'; break;
208  case 'm': c = 'M'; break;
209  case 'n': c = 'N'; break;
210  case 'o': c = 'O'; break;
211  case 'p': c = 'P'; break;
212  case 'q': c = 'Q'; break;
213  case 'r': c = 'R'; break;
214  case 's': c = 'S'; break;
215  case 't': c = 'T'; break;
216  case 'u': c = 'U'; break;
217  case 'v': c = 'V'; break;
218  case 'w': c = 'W'; break;
219  case 'x': c = 'X'; break;
220  case 'y': c = 'Y'; break;
221  case 'z': c = 'Z'; break;
222 
223  default:
224  break;
225  }
226  if( preceded_by_whitespace && non_empty )
227  result.push_back(' ');
228  result.push_back(c);
229  preceded_by_whitespace = false;
230  non_empty = true;
231  }
232  return result;
233 }
234 
235 struct op_prototype_visitor
236 {
237  typedef void result_type;
238 
239  int t = 0;
240  flat_map< std::string, operation >& name2op;
241 
242  op_prototype_visitor(
243  int _t,
244  flat_map< std::string, operation >& _prototype_ops
245  ):t(_t), name2op(_prototype_ops) {}
246 
247  template<typename Type>
248  result_type operator()( const Type& op )const
249  {
250  string name = fc::get_typename<Type>::name();
251  size_t p = name.rfind(':');
252  if( p != string::npos )
253  name = name.substr( p+1 );
254  name2op[ name ] = Type();
255  }
256 };

258 class wallet_api_impl
259 {
260 public:
261  api_documentation method_documentation;
262 private:
263  void claim_registered_account(const account_object& account)
264  {
265  auto it = _wallet.pending_account_registrations.find( account.name );
266  FC_ASSERT( it != _wallet.pending_account_registrations.end() );
267  for (const std::string& wif_key : it->second)
268  if( !import_key( account.name, wif_key ) )
269  {
270  // somebody else beat our pending registration, there is
271  // nothing we can do except log it and move on
272  elog( "account ${name} registered by someone else first!",
273  ("name", account.name) );
274  // might as well remove it from pending regs,
275  // because there is now no way this registration
276  // can become valid (even in the extremely rare
277  // possibility of migrating to a fork where the
278  // name is available, the user can always
279  // manually re-register)
280  }
281  _wallet.pending_account_registrations.erase( it );
282  }
283 
284  // after a witness registration succeeds, this saves the private key in the wallet permanently
285  //
286  void claim_registered_witness(const std::string& witness_name)
287  {
288  auto iter = _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.find(witness_name);
289  FC_ASSERT(iter != _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.end());
290  std::string wif_key = iter->second;
291 
292  // get the list key id this key is registered with in the chain
293  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> witness_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
294  FC_ASSERT(witness_private_key);
295 
296  auto pub_key = witness_private_key->get_public_key();
297  _keys[pub_key] = wif_key;
298  _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.erase(iter);
299  }
300 
301  fc::mutex _resync_mutex;
302  void resync()
303  {
304  fc::scoped_lock<fc::mutex> lock(_resync_mutex);
305  // this method is used to update wallet_data annotations
306  // e.g. wallet has been restarted and was not notified
307  // of events while it was down
308  //
309  // everything that is done "incremental style" when a push
310  // notification is received, should also be done here
311  // "batch style" by querying the blockchain
312 
313  if( !_wallet.pending_account_registrations.empty() )
314  {
315  // make a vector of the account names pending registration
316  std::vector<string> pending_account_names = boost::copy_range<std::vector<string> >(boost::adaptors::keys(_wallet.pending_account_registrations));
317 
318  // look those up on the blockchain
319  std::vector<fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object >>
320  pending_account_objects = _remote_db->lookup_account_names( pending_account_names );
321 
322  // if any of them exist, claim them
323  for( const fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>& optional_account : pending_account_objects )
324  if( optional_account )
325  claim_registered_account(*optional_account);
326  }
327 
328  if (!_wallet.pending_witness_registrations.empty())
329  {
330  // make a vector of the owner accounts for witnesses pending registration
331  std::vector<string> pending_witness_names = boost::copy_range<std::vector<string> >(boost::adaptors::keys(_wallet.pending_witness_registrations));
332 
333  // look up the owners on the blockchain
334  std::vector<fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>> owner_account_objects = _remote_db->lookup_account_names(pending_witness_names);
335 
336  // if any of them have registered witnesses, claim them
337  for( const fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>& optional_account : owner_account_objects )
338  if (optional_account)
339  {
340  fc::optional<witness_object> witness_obj = _remote_db->get_witness_by_account(optional_account->id);
341  if (witness_obj)
342  claim_registered_witness(optional_account->name);
343  }
344  }
345  }

347  void enable_umask_protection()
348  {
349 #ifdef __unix__
350  _old_umask = umask( S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO );
351 #endif
352  }
353 
354  void disable_umask_protection()
355  {
356 #ifdef __unix__
357  umask( _old_umask );
358 #endif
359  }
360 
361  void init_prototype_ops()
362  {
363  operation op;
364  for( int t=0; t<op.count(); t++ )
365  {
366  op.set_which( t );
367  op.visit( op_prototype_visitor(t, _prototype_ops) );
368  }
369  return;
370  }

372  map<transaction_handle_type, signed_transaction> _builder_transactions;
373 
374  // if the user executes the same command twice in quick succession,
375  // we might generate the same transaction id, and cause the second
376  // transaction to be rejected. This can be avoided by altering the
377  // second transaction slightly (bumping up the expiration time by
378  // a second). Keep track of recent transaction ids we've generated
379  // so we can know if we need to do this
380  struct recently_generated_transaction_record
381  {
382  fc::time_point_sec generation_time;
383  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type transaction_id;
384  };
385  struct timestamp_index{};
386  typedef boost::multi_index_container<recently_generated_transaction_record,
387  boost::multi_index::indexed_by<boost::multi_index::hashed_unique<boost::multi_index::member<recently_generated_transaction_record,
388  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type,
389  &recently_generated_transaction_record::transaction_id>,
390  std::hash<graphene::chain::transaction_id_type> >,
391  boost::multi_index::ordered_non_unique<boost::multi_index::tag<timestamp_index>,
392  boost::multi_index::member<recently_generated_transaction_record, fc::time_point_sec, &recently_generated_transaction_record::generation_time> > > > recently_generated_transaction_set_type;
393  recently_generated_transaction_set_type _recently_generated_transactions;
394 
395 public:
396  wallet_api& self;
397  wallet_api_impl( wallet_api& s, const wallet_data& initial_data, fc::api<login_api> rapi )
398  : self(s),
399  _chain_id(initial_data.chain_id),
400  _remote_api(rapi),
401  _remote_db(rapi->database()),
402  _remote_net_broadcast(rapi->network_broadcast()),
403  _remote_hist(rapi->history())
404  {
405  chain_id_type remote_chain_id = _remote_db->get_chain_id();
406  if( remote_chain_id != _chain_id )
407  {
408  FC_THROW( "Remote server gave us an unexpected chain_id",
409  ("remote_chain_id", remote_chain_id)
410  ("chain_id", _chain_id) );
411  }
412  init_prototype_ops();
413 
414  _remote_db->set_block_applied_callback( [this](const variant& block_id )
415  {
416  on_block_applied( block_id );
417  } );
418 
419  _wallet.chain_id = _chain_id;
420  _wallet.ws_server = initial_data.ws_server;
421  _wallet.ws_user = initial_data.ws_user;
422  _wallet.ws_password = initial_data.ws_password;
423  }
424  virtual ~wallet_api_impl()
425  {
426  try
427  {
428  _remote_db->cancel_all_subscriptions();
429  }
430  catch (const fc::exception& e)
431  {
432  // Right now the wallet_api has no way of knowing if the connection to the
433  // witness has already disconnected (via the witness node exiting first).
434  // If it has exited, cancel_all_subscriptsions() will throw and there's
435  // nothing we can do about it.
436  // dlog("Caught exception ${e} while canceling database subscriptions", ("e", e));
437  }
438  }

440  void encrypt_keys()
441  {
442  if( !is_locked() )
443  {
444  plain_keys data;
445  data.keys = _keys;
446  data.checksum = _checksum;
447  auto plain_txt = fc::raw::pack(data);
448  _wallet.cipher_keys = fc::aes_encrypt( data.checksum, plain_txt );
449  }
450  }
451 
452  void on_block_applied( const variant& block_id )
453  {
454  fc::async([this]{resync();}, "Resync after block");
455  }
456 
457  bool copy_wallet_file( string destination_filename )
458  {
459  fc::path src_path = get_wallet_filename();
460  if( !fc::exists( src_path ) )
461  return false;
462  fc::path dest_path = destination_filename + _wallet_filename_extension;
463  int suffix = 0;
464  while( fc::exists(dest_path) )
465  {
466  ++suffix;
467  dest_path = destination_filename + "-" + to_string( suffix ) + _wallet_filename_extension;
468  }
469  wlog( "backing up wallet ${src} to ${dest}",
470  ("src", src_path)
471  ("dest", dest_path) );
472 
473  fc::path dest_parent = fc::absolute(dest_path).parent_path();
474  try
475  {
476  enable_umask_protection();
477  if( !fc::exists( dest_parent ) )
478  fc::create_directories( dest_parent );
479  fc::copy( src_path, dest_path );
480  disable_umask_protection();
481  }
482  catch(...)
483  {
484  disable_umask_protection();
485  throw;
486  }
487  return true;
488  }
489 
490  bool is_locked()const
491  {
492  return _checksum == fc::sha512();
493  }

508  variant info() const
509  {
510  auto chain_props = get_chain_properties();
511  auto global_props = get_global_properties();
512  auto dynamic_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
513  fc::mutable_variant_object result;
514  result["head_block_num"] = dynamic_props.head_block_number;
515  result["head_block_id"] = fc::variant(dynamic_props.head_block_id, 1);
516  result["head_block_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string(dynamic_props.time,
517  time_point_sec(time_point::now()),
518  " old");
519  result["next_maintenance_time"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string(dynamic_props.next_maintenance_time);
520  result["chain_id"] = chain_props.chain_id;
521  result["participation"] = (100*dynamic_props.recent_slots_filled.popcount()) / 128.0;
522  result["active_witnesses"] = fc::variant(global_props.active_witnesses, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS);
523  result["active_committee_members"] = fc::variant(global_props.active_committee_members, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS);
524  return result;
525  }
526 
527  variant_object about() const
528  {
529  string client_version( graphene::utilities::git_revision_description );
530  const size_t pos = client_version.find( '/' );
531  if( pos != string::npos && client_version.size() > pos )
532  client_version = client_version.substr( pos + 1 );
533 
534  fc::mutable_variant_object result;
535  //result["blockchain_name"] = BLOCKCHAIN_NAME;
536  //result["blockchain_description"] = BTS_BLOCKCHAIN_DESCRIPTION;
537  result["client_version"] = client_version;
538  result["graphene_revision"] = graphene::utilities::git_revision_sha;
539  result["graphene_revision_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( fc::time_point_sec( graphene::utilities::git_revision_unix_timestamp ) );
540  result["fc_revision"] = fc::git_revision_sha;
541  result["fc_revision_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( fc::time_point_sec( fc::git_revision_unix_timestamp ) );
542  result["compile_date"] = "compiled on " __DATE__ " at " __TIME__;
543  result["boost_version"] = boost::replace_all_copy(std::string(BOOST_LIB_VERSION), "_", ".");
544  result["openssl_version"] = OPENSSL_VERSION_TEXT;
545 
546  std::string bitness = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(8 * sizeof(int*)) + "-bit";
547 #if defined(__APPLE__)
548  std::string os = "osx";
549 #elif defined(__linux__)
550  std::string os = "linux";
551 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
552  std::string os = "win32";
553 #else
554  std::string os = "other";
555 #endif
556  result["build"] = os + " " + bitness;
557 
558  return result;
559  }

573  account_object get_account(account_id_type id) const
574  {
575  auto rec = _remote_db->get_accounts({id}).front();
576  FC_ASSERT(rec);
577  return *rec;
578  }
579  account_object get_account(string account_name_or_id) const
580  {
581  FC_ASSERT( account_name_or_id.size() > 0 );
582 
583  if( auto id = maybe_id<account_id_type>(account_name_or_id) )
584  {
585  // It's an ID
586  return get_account(*id);
587  } else {
588  auto rec = _remote_db->lookup_account_names({account_name_or_id}).front();
589  FC_ASSERT( rec && rec->name == account_name_or_id );
590  return *rec;
591  }
592  }
593  account_id_type get_account_id(string account_name_or_id) const
594  {
595  return get_account(account_name_or_id).get_id();
596  }
597  optional<asset_object> find_asset(asset_id_type id)const
598  {
599  auto rec = _remote_db->get_assets({id}).front();
600  return rec;
601  }
602  optional<asset_object> find_asset(string asset_symbol_or_id)const
603  {
604  FC_ASSERT( asset_symbol_or_id.size() > 0 );
605 
606  if( auto id = maybe_id<asset_id_type>(asset_symbol_or_id) )
607  {
608  // It's an ID
609  return find_asset(*id);
610  } else {
611  // It's a symbol
612  auto rec = _remote_db->lookup_asset_symbols({asset_symbol_or_id}).front();
613  if( rec )
614  {
615  if( rec->symbol != asset_symbol_or_id )
616  return optional<asset_object>();
617  }
618  return rec;
619  }
620  }
621  asset_object get_asset(asset_id_type id)const
622  {
623  auto opt = find_asset(id);
624  FC_ASSERT(opt);
625  return *opt;
626  }
627  asset_object get_asset(string asset_symbol_or_id)const
628  {
629  auto opt = find_asset(asset_symbol_or_id);
630  FC_ASSERT(opt);
631  return *opt;
632  }

634  asset_id_type get_asset_id(string asset_symbol_or_id) const
635  {
636  FC_ASSERT( asset_symbol_or_id.size() > 0 );
637  vector<optional<asset_object>> opt_asset;
638  if( std::isdigit( asset_symbol_or_id.front() ) )
639  return fc::variant(asset_symbol_or_id, 1).as<asset_id_type>( 1 );
640  opt_asset = _remote_db->lookup_asset_symbols( {asset_symbol_or_id} );
641  FC_ASSERT( (opt_asset.size() > 0) && (opt_asset[0].valid()) );
642  return opt_asset[0]->id;
643  }

650  fc::ecc::private_key get_private_key(const public_key_type& id)const
651  {
652  auto it = _keys.find(id);
653  FC_ASSERT( it != _keys.end() );
654 
655  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
656  FC_ASSERT( privkey );
657  return *privkey;
658  }
659 
660  fc::ecc::private_key get_private_key_for_account(const account_object& account)const
661  {
662  vector<public_key_type> active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
663  if (active_keys.size() != 1)
664  FC_THROW("Expecting a simple authority with one active key");
665  return get_private_key(active_keys.front());
666  }
667 
668  // imports the private key into the wallet, and associate it in some way (?) with the
669  // given account name.
670  // @returns true if the key matches a current active/owner/memo key for the named
671  // account, false otherwise (but it is stored either way)
672  bool import_key(string account_name_or_id, string wif_key)
673  {
674  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> optional_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
675  if (!optional_private_key)
676  FC_THROW("Invalid private key");
677  graphene::chain::public_key_type wif_pub_key = optional_private_key->get_public_key();
678 
679  account_object account = get_account( account_name_or_id );
680 
681  // make a list of all current public keys for the named account
682  flat_set<public_key_type> all_keys_for_account;
683  std::vector<public_key_type> active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
684  std::vector<public_key_type> owner_keys = account.owner.get_keys();
685  std::copy(active_keys.begin(), active_keys.end(), std::inserter(all_keys_for_account, all_keys_for_account.end()));
686  std::copy(owner_keys.begin(), owner_keys.end(), std::inserter(all_keys_for_account, all_keys_for_account.end()));
687  all_keys_for_account.insert(account.options.memo_key);
688 
689  _keys[wif_pub_key] = wif_key;
690 
691  _wallet.update_account(account);
692 
693  _wallet.extra_keys[account.id].insert(wif_pub_key);
694 
695  return all_keys_for_account.find(wif_pub_key) != all_keys_for_account.end();
696  }
697 
698  vector< signed_transaction > import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast );
699 
700  bool load_wallet_file(string wallet_filename = "")
701  {
702  // TODO: Merge imported wallet with existing wallet,
703  // instead of replacing it
704  if( wallet_filename == "" )
705  wallet_filename = _wallet_filename;
706 
707  if( ! fc::exists( wallet_filename ) )
708  return false;
709 
710  _wallet = fc::json::from_file( wallet_filename ).as< wallet_data >( 2 * GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
711  if( _wallet.chain_id != _chain_id )
712  FC_THROW( "Wallet chain ID does not match",
713  ("wallet.chain_id", _wallet.chain_id)
714  ("chain_id", _chain_id) );
715 
716  size_t account_pagination = 100;
717  vector< account_id_type > account_ids_to_send;
718  size_t n = _wallet.my_accounts.size();
719  account_ids_to_send.reserve( std::min( account_pagination, n ) );
720  auto it = _wallet.my_accounts.begin();
721 
722  for( size_t start=0; start<n; start+=account_pagination )
723  {
724  size_t end = std::min( start+account_pagination, n );
725  assert( end > start );
726  account_ids_to_send.clear();
727  std::vector< account_object > old_accounts;
728  for( size_t i=start; i<end; i++ )
729  {
730  assert( it != _wallet.my_accounts.end() );
731  old_accounts.push_back( *it );
732  account_ids_to_send.push_back( old_accounts.back().id );
733  ++it;
734  }
735  std::vector< optional< account_object > > accounts = _remote_db->get_accounts(account_ids_to_send);
736  // server response should be same length as request
737  FC_ASSERT( accounts.size() == account_ids_to_send.size() );
738  size_t i = 0;
739  for( const optional< account_object >& acct : accounts )
740  {
741  account_object& old_acct = old_accounts[i];
742  if( !acct.valid() )
743  {
744  elog( "Could not find account ${id} : \"${name}\" does not exist on the chain!", ("id", old_acct.id)("name", old_acct.name) );
745  i++;
746  continue;
747  }
748  // this check makes sure the server didn't send results
749  // in a different order, or accounts we didn't request
750  FC_ASSERT( acct->id == old_acct.id );
751  if( fc::json::to_string(*acct) != fc::json::to_string(old_acct) )
752  {
753  wlog( "Account ${id} : \"${name}\" updated on chain", ("id", acct->id)("name", acct->name) );
754  }
755  _wallet.update_account( *acct );
756  i++;
757  }
758  }
759 
760  return true;
761  }
762  void save_wallet_file(string wallet_filename = "")
763  {
764  //
765  // Serialize in memory, then save to disk
766  //
767  // This approach lessens the risk of a partially written wallet
768  // if exceptions are thrown in serialization
769  //
770 
771  encrypt_keys();
772 
773  if( wallet_filename == "" )
774  wallet_filename = _wallet_filename;
775 
776  wlog( "saving wallet to file ${fn}", ("fn", wallet_filename) );
777 
778  string data = fc::json::to_pretty_string( _wallet );
779  try
780  {
781  enable_umask_protection();
782  //
783  // Parentheses on the following declaration fails to compile,
784  // due to the Most Vexing Parse. Thanks, C++
785  //
786  // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Most_vexing_parse
787  //
788  fc::ofstream outfile{ fc::path( wallet_filename ) };
789  outfile.write( data.c_str(), data.length() );
790  outfile.flush();
791  outfile.close();
792  disable_umask_protection();
793  }
794  catch(...)
795  {
796  disable_umask_protection();
797  throw;
798  }
799  }
800 
801  transaction_handle_type begin_builder_transaction()
802  {
803  int trx_handle = _builder_transactions.empty()? 0
804  : (--_builder_transactions.end())->first + 1;
805  _builder_transactions[trx_handle];
806  return trx_handle;
807  }
808  void add_operation_to_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type transaction_handle, const operation& op)
809  {
810  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(transaction_handle));
811  _builder_transactions[transaction_handle].operations.emplace_back(op);
812  }
813  void replace_operation_in_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle,
814  uint32_t operation_index,
815  const operation& new_op)
816  {
817  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
818  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
819  FC_ASSERT( operation_index < trx.operations.size());
820  trx.operations[operation_index] = new_op;
821  }
822  asset set_fees_on_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle, string fee_asset = GRAPHENE_SYMBOL)
823  {
824  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
825 
826  auto fee_asset_obj = get_asset(fee_asset);
827  asset total_fee = fee_asset_obj.amount(0);
828 
829  auto gprops = _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters;
830  if( fee_asset_obj.get_id() != asset_id_type() )
831  {
832  for( auto& op : _builder_transactions[handle].operations )
833  total_fee += gprops.current_fees->set_fee( op, fee_asset_obj.options.core_exchange_rate );
834 
835  FC_ASSERT((total_fee * fee_asset_obj.options.core_exchange_rate).amount <=
836  get_object<asset_dynamic_data_object>(fee_asset_obj.dynamic_asset_data_id).fee_pool,
837  "Cannot pay fees in ${asset}, as this asset's fee pool is insufficiently funded.",
838  ("asset", fee_asset_obj.symbol));
839  } else {
840  for( auto& op : _builder_transactions[handle].operations )
841  total_fee += gprops.current_fees->set_fee( op );
842  }
843 
844  return total_fee;
845  }
846  transaction preview_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle)
847  {
848  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
849  return _builder_transactions[handle];
850  }
851  signed_transaction sign_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type transaction_handle, bool broadcast = true)
852  {
853  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(transaction_handle));
854 
855  return _builder_transactions[transaction_handle] = sign_transaction(_builder_transactions[transaction_handle], broadcast);
856  }
857 
858  pair<transaction_id_type,signed_transaction> broadcast_transaction(signed_transaction tx)
859  {
860  try {
861  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction(tx);
862  }
863  catch (const fc::exception& e) {
864  elog("Caught exception while broadcasting tx ${id}: ${e}", ("id", tx.id().str())("e", e.to_detail_string()));
865  throw;
866  }
867  return std::make_pair(tx.id(),tx);
868  }

870  signed_transaction propose_builder_transaction(
871  transaction_handle_type handle,
872  time_point_sec expiration = time_point::now() + fc::minutes(1),
873  uint32_t review_period_seconds = 0, bool broadcast = true)
874  {
875  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
876  proposal_create_operation op;
877  op.expiration_time = expiration;
878  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
879  std::transform(trx.operations.begin(), trx.operations.end(), std::back_inserter(op.proposed_ops),
880  [](const operation& op) -> op_wrapper { return op; });
881  if( review_period_seconds )
882  op.review_period_seconds = review_period_seconds;
883  trx.operations = {op};
884  _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees->set_fee( trx.operations.front() );
885 
886  return trx = sign_transaction(trx, broadcast);
887  }
888 
889  signed_transaction propose_builder_transaction2(
890  transaction_handle_type handle,
891  string account_name_or_id,
892  time_point_sec expiration = time_point::now() + fc::minutes(1),
893  uint32_t review_period_seconds = 0, bool broadcast = true)
894  {
895  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
896  proposal_create_operation op;
897  op.fee_paying_account = get_account(account_name_or_id).get_id();
898  op.expiration_time = expiration;
899  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
900  std::transform(trx.operations.begin(), trx.operations.end(), std::back_inserter(op.proposed_ops),
901  [](const operation& op) -> op_wrapper { return op; });
902  if( review_period_seconds )
903  op.review_period_seconds = review_period_seconds;
904  trx.operations = {op};
905  _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees->set_fee( trx.operations.front() );
906 
907  return trx = sign_transaction(trx, broadcast);
908  }

916  signed_transaction register_account(string name,
917  public_key_type owner,
918  public_key_type active,
919  string registrar_account,
920  string referrer_account,
921  uint32_t referrer_percent,
922  bool broadcast = false)
923  { try {
924  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
925  FC_ASSERT( is_valid_name(name) );
926  account_create_operation account_create_op;
927 
928  // #449 referrer_percent is on 0-100 scale, if user has larger
929  // number it means their script is using GRAPHENE_100_PERCENT scale
930  // instead of 0-100 scale.
931  FC_ASSERT( referrer_percent <= 100 );
932  // TODO: process when pay_from_account is ID
933 
934  account_object registrar_account_object =
935  this->get_account( registrar_account );
936  FC_ASSERT( registrar_account_object.is_lifetime_member() );
937 
938  account_id_type registrar_account_id = registrar_account_object.id;
939 
940  account_object referrer_account_object =
941  this->get_account( referrer_account );
942  account_create_op.referrer = referrer_account_object.id;
943  account_create_op.referrer_percent = uint16_t( referrer_percent * GRAPHENE_1_PERCENT );
944 
945  account_create_op.registrar = registrar_account_id;
946  account_create_op.name = name;
947  account_create_op.owner = authority(1, owner, 1);
948  account_create_op.active = authority(1, active, 1);
949  account_create_op.options.memo_key = active;
950 
951  signed_transaction tx;
952 
953  tx.operations.push_back( account_create_op );
954 
955  auto current_fees = _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees;
956  set_operation_fees( tx, current_fees );
957 
958  vector<public_key_type> paying_keys = registrar_account_object.active.get_keys();
959 
960  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
961  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
962  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30) );
963  tx.validate();
964 
965  for( public_key_type& key : paying_keys )
966  {
967  auto it = _keys.find(key);
968  if( it != _keys.end() )
969  {
970  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
971  if( !privkey.valid() )
972  {
973  FC_ASSERT( false, "Malformed private key in _keys" );
974  }
975  tx.sign( *privkey, _chain_id );
976  }
977  }
978 
979  if( broadcast )
980  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
981  return tx;
982  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name)(owner)(active)(registrar_account)(referrer_account)(referrer_percent)(broadcast) ) }
983 
984 
985  signed_transaction upgrade_account(string name, bool broadcast)
986  { try {
987  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
988  account_object account_obj = get_account(name);
989  FC_ASSERT( !account_obj.is_lifetime_member() );
990 
991  signed_transaction tx;
992  account_upgrade_operation op;
993  op.account_to_upgrade = account_obj.get_id();
994  op.upgrade_to_lifetime_member = true;
995  tx.operations = {op};
996  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
997  tx.validate();
998 
999  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1000  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name) ) }
1001 
1002 
1003  // This function generates derived keys starting with index 0 and keeps incrementing
1004  // the index until it finds a key that isn't registered in the block chain. To be
1005  // safer, it continues checking for a few more keys to make sure there wasn't a short gap
1006  // caused by a failed registration or the like.
1007  int find_first_unused_derived_key_index(const fc::ecc::private_key& parent_key)
1008  {
1009  int first_unused_index = 0;
1010  int number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 0;
1011  for (int key_index = 0; ; ++key_index)
1012  {
1013  fc::ecc::private_key derived_private_key = derive_private_key(key_to_wif(parent_key), key_index);
1014  graphene::chain::public_key_type derived_public_key = derived_private_key.get_public_key();
1015  if( _keys.find(derived_public_key) == _keys.end() )
1016  {
1017  if (number_of_consecutive_unused_keys)
1018  {
1019  ++number_of_consecutive_unused_keys;
1020  if (number_of_consecutive_unused_keys > 5)
1021  return first_unused_index;
1022  }
1023  else
1024  {
1025  first_unused_index = key_index;
1026  number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 1;
1027  }
1028  }
1029  else
1030  {
1031  // key_index is used
1032  first_unused_index = 0;
1033  number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 0;
1034  }
1035  }
1036  }
1037 
1038  signed_transaction create_account_with_private_key(fc::ecc::private_key owner_privkey,
1039  string account_name,
1040  string registrar_account,
1041  string referrer_account,
1042  bool broadcast = false,
1043  bool save_wallet = true)
1044  { try {
1045  int active_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(owner_privkey);
1046  fc::ecc::private_key active_privkey = derive_private_key( key_to_wif(owner_privkey), active_key_index);
1047 
1048  int memo_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(active_privkey);
1049  fc::ecc::private_key memo_privkey = derive_private_key( key_to_wif(active_privkey), memo_key_index);
1050 
1051  graphene::chain::public_key_type owner_pubkey = owner_privkey.get_public_key();
1052  graphene::chain::public_key_type active_pubkey = active_privkey.get_public_key();
1053  graphene::chain::public_key_type memo_pubkey = memo_privkey.get_public_key();
1054 
1055  account_create_operation account_create_op;
1056 
1057  // TODO: process when pay_from_account is ID
1058 
1059  account_object registrar_account_object = get_account( registrar_account );
1060 
1061  account_id_type registrar_account_id = registrar_account_object.id;
1062 
1063  account_object referrer_account_object = get_account( referrer_account );
1064  account_create_op.referrer = referrer_account_object.id;
1065  account_create_op.referrer_percent = referrer_account_object.referrer_rewards_percentage;
1066 
1067  account_create_op.registrar = registrar_account_id;
1068  account_create_op.name = account_name;
1069  account_create_op.owner = authority(1, owner_pubkey, 1);
1070  account_create_op.active = authority(1, active_pubkey, 1);
1071  account_create_op.options.memo_key = memo_pubkey;
1072 
1073  // current_fee_schedule()
1074  // find_account(pay_from_account)
1075 
1076  // account_create_op.fee = account_create_op.calculate_fee(db.current_fee_schedule());
1077 
1078  signed_transaction tx;
1079 
1080  tx.operations.push_back( account_create_op );
1081 
1082  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1083 
1084  vector<public_key_type> paying_keys = registrar_account_object.active.get_keys();
1085 
1086  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
1087  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
1088  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30) );
1089  tx.validate();
1090 
1091  for( public_key_type& key : paying_keys )
1092  {
1093  auto it = _keys.find(key);
1094  if( it != _keys.end() )
1095  {
1096  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
1097  FC_ASSERT( privkey.valid(), "Malformed private key in _keys" );
1098  tx.sign( *privkey, _chain_id );
1099  }
1100  }
1101 
1102  // we do not insert owner_privkey here because
1103  // it is intended to only be used for key recovery
1104  _wallet.pending_account_registrations[account_name].push_back(key_to_wif( active_privkey ));
1105  _wallet.pending_account_registrations[account_name].push_back(key_to_wif( memo_privkey ));
1106  if( save_wallet )
1107  save_wallet_file();
1108  if( broadcast )
1109  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
1110  return tx;
1111  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name)(registrar_account)(referrer_account)(broadcast) ) }
1112 
1113  signed_transaction create_account_with_brain_key(string brain_key,
1114  string account_name,
1115  string registrar_account,
1116  string referrer_account,
1117  bool broadcast = false,
1118  bool save_wallet = true)
1119  { try {
1120  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
1121  string normalized_brain_key = normalize_brain_key( brain_key );
1122  // TODO: scan blockchain for accounts that exist with same brain key
1123  fc::ecc::private_key owner_privkey = derive_private_key( normalized_brain_key, 0 );
1124  return create_account_with_private_key(owner_privkey, account_name, registrar_account, referrer_account, broadcast, save_wallet);
1125  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name)(registrar_account)(referrer_account) ) }

1128  signed_transaction create_asset(string issuer,
1129  string symbol,
1130  uint8_t precision,

1153  signed_transaction update_asset(string symbol,
1154  optional<string> new_issuer,
1155  asset_options new_options,
1156  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1157  { try {
1158  optional<asset_object> asset_to_update = find_asset(symbol);
1159  if (!asset_to_update)
1160  FC_THROW("No asset with that symbol exists!");
1161  optional<account_id_type> new_issuer_account_id;
1162  if (new_issuer)
1163  {
1164  FC_ASSERT( _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties().time < HARDFORK_CORE_199_TIME,
1165  "The use of 'new_issuer' is no longer supported. Please use `update_asset_issuer' instead!");
1166  account_object new_issuer_account = get_account(*new_issuer);
1167  new_issuer_account_id = new_issuer_account.id;
1168  }
1169 
1170  asset_update_operation update_op;
1171  update_op.issuer = asset_to_update->issuer;
1172  update_op.asset_to_update = asset_to_update->id;
1173  update_op.new_issuer = new_issuer_account_id;
1174  update_op.new_options = new_options;
1175 
1176  signed_transaction tx;
1177  tx.operations.push_back( update_op );
1178  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);

1444  witness_object get_witness(string owner_account)
1445  {
1446  try
1447  {
1448  fc::optional<witness_id_type> witness_id = maybe_id<witness_id_type>(owner_account);
1449  if (witness_id)
1450  {
1451  std::vector<witness_id_type> ids_to_get;
1452  ids_to_get.push_back(*witness_id);
1453  std::vector<fc::optional<witness_object>> witness_objects = _remote_db->get_witnesses(ids_to_get);
1454  if (witness_objects.front())
1455  return *witness_objects.front();
1456  FC_THROW("No witness is registered for id ${id}", ("id", owner_account));
1457  }
1458  else
1459  {
1460  // then maybe it's the owner account
1461  try
1462  {
1463  account_id_type owner_account_id = get_account_id(owner_account);
1464  fc::optional<witness_object> witness = _remote_db->get_witness_by_account(owner_account_id);
1465  if (witness)
1466  return *witness;
1467  else
1468  FC_THROW("No witness is registered for account ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1469  }
1470  catch (const fc::exception&)
1471  {
1472  FC_THROW("No account or witness named ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1473  }
1474  }
1475  }
1476  FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account) )
1477  }
1478 
1479  committee_member_object get_committee_member(string owner_account)
1480  {
1481  try
1482  {
1483  fc::optional<committee_member_id_type> committee_member_id = maybe_id<committee_member_id_type>(owner_account);
1484  if (committee_member_id)
1485  {
1486  std::vector<committee_member_id_type> ids_to_get;
1487  ids_to_get.push_back(*committee_member_id);
1488  std::vector<fc::optional<committee_member_object>> committee_member_objects = _remote_db->get_committee_members(ids_to_get);
1489  if (committee_member_objects.front())
1490  return *committee_member_objects.front();
1491  FC_THROW("No committee_member is registered for id ${id}", ("id", owner_account));
1492  }
1493  else
1494  {
1495  // then maybe it's the owner account
1496  try
1497  {
1498  account_id_type owner_account_id = get_account_id(owner_account);
1499  fc::optional<committee_member_object> committee_member = _remote_db->get_committee_member_by_account(owner_account_id);
1500  if (committee_member)
1501  return *committee_member;
1502  else
1503  FC_THROW("No committee_member is registered for account ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1504  }
1505  catch (const fc::exception&)
1506  {
1507  FC_THROW("No account or committee_member named ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1508  }
1509  }
1510  }
1511  FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account) )
1512  }

1514  signed_transaction create_witness(string owner_account,
1515  string url,
1516  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1517  { try {
1518  account_object witness_account = get_account(owner_account);
1519  fc::ecc::private_key active_private_key = get_private_key_for_account(witness_account);
1520  int witness_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(active_private_key);
1521  fc::ecc::private_key witness_private_key = derive_private_key(key_to_wif(active_private_key), witness_key_index);
1522  graphene::chain::public_key_type witness_public_key = witness_private_key.get_public_key();
1523 
1524  witness_create_operation witness_create_op;
1525  witness_create_op.witness_account = witness_account.id;
1526  witness_create_op.block_signing_key = witness_public_key;
1527  witness_create_op.url = url;
1528 
1529  if (_remote_db->get_witness_by_account(witness_create_op.witness_account))
1530  FC_THROW("Account ${owner_account} is already a witness", ("owner_account", owner_account));
1531 
1532  signed_transaction tx;
1533  tx.operations.push_back( witness_create_op );
1534  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1535  tx.validate();
1536 
1537  _wallet.pending_witness_registrations[owner_account] = key_to_wif(witness_private_key);
1538 
1539  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1540  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account)(broadcast) ) }
1541 
1542  signed_transaction update_witness(string witness_name,
1543  string url,
1544  string block_signing_key,
1545  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1546  { try {

1548  account_object witness_account = get_account( witness.witness_account );

1550  witness_update_operation witness_update_op;

1553  if( url != "" )
1554  witness_update_op.new_url = url;
1555  if( block_signing_key != "" )
1556  witness_update_op.new_signing_key = public_key_type( block_signing_key );
1557 
1558  signed_transaction tx;
1559  tx.operations.push_back( witness_update_op );

1561  tx.validate();

1563  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );

1566  template<typename WorkerInit>
1567  static WorkerInit _create_worker_initializer( const variant& worker_settings )
1568  {
1569  WorkerInit result;
1570  from_variant( worker_settings, result, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
1571  return result;
1572  }
1573 
1574  signed_transaction create_worker(
1575  string owner_account,
1576  time_point_sec work_begin_date,
1577  time_point_sec work_end_date,
1578  share_type daily_pay,
1579  string name,
1580  string url,
1581  variant worker_settings,
1582  bool broadcast
1583  )
1584  {
1585  worker_initializer init;
1586  std::string wtype = worker_settings["type"].get_string();
1587 
1588  // TODO: Use introspection to do this dispatch
1589  if( wtype == "burn" )
1590  init = _create_worker_initializer< burn_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1591  else if( wtype == "refund" )
1592  init = _create_worker_initializer< refund_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1593  else if( wtype == "vesting" )
1594  init = _create_worker_initializer< vesting_balance_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1595  else
1596  {
1597  FC_ASSERT( false, "unknown worker[\"type\"] value" );
1598  }
1599 
1600  worker_create_operation op;
1601  op.owner = get_account( owner_account ).id;
1602  op.work_begin_date = work_begin_date;
1603  op.work_end_date = work_end_date;
1604  op.daily_pay = daily_pay;
1605  op.name = name;
1606  op.url = url;
1607  op.initializer = init;
1608 
1609  signed_transaction tx;
1610  tx.operations.push_back( op );
1611  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1612  tx.validate();
1613 
1614  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1615  }
1616 
1617  signed_transaction update_worker_votes(
1618  string account,
1619  worker_vote_delta delta,
1620  bool broadcast
1621  )
1622  {
1623  account_object acct = get_account( account );
1624 
1625  // you could probably use a faster algorithm for this, but flat_set is fast enough :)
1626  flat_set< worker_id_type > merged;
1627  merged.reserve( delta.vote_for.size() + delta.vote_against.size() + delta.vote_abstain.size() );
1628  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_for )
1629  {
1630  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1631  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1632  }
1633  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_against )
1634  {
1635  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1636  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1637  }
1638  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_abstain )
1639  {
1640  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1641  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1642  }
1643 
1644  // should be enforced by FC_ASSERT's above
1645  assert( merged.size() == delta.vote_for.size() + delta.vote_against.size() + delta.vote_abstain.size() );
1646 
1647  vector< object_id_type > query_ids;
1648  for( const worker_id_type& wid : merged )
1649  query_ids.push_back( wid );
1650 
1651  flat_set<vote_id_type> new_votes( acct.options.votes );
1652 
1653  fc::variants objects = _remote_db->get_objects( query_ids );
1654  for( const variant& obj : objects )
1655  {
1656  worker_object wo;
1657  from_variant( obj, wo, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
1658  new_votes.erase( wo.vote_for );
1659  new_votes.erase( wo.vote_against );
1660  if( delta.vote_for.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_for.end() )
1661  new_votes.insert( wo.vote_for );
1662  else if( delta.vote_against.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_against.end() )
1663  new_votes.insert( wo.vote_against );
1664  else
1665  assert( delta.vote_abstain.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_abstain.end() );
1666  }
1667 
1668  account_update_operation update_op;
1669  update_op.account = acct.id;
1670  update_op.new_options = acct.options;
1671  update_op.new_options->votes = new_votes;
1672 
1673  signed_transaction tx;
1674  tx.operations.push_back( update_op );
1675  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1676  tx.validate();
1677 
1678  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1679  }
1680 
1681  vector< vesting_balance_object_with_info > get_vesting_balances( string account_name )
1682  { try {
1683  fc::optional<vesting_balance_id_type> vbid = maybe_id<vesting_balance_id_type>( account_name );
1684  std::vector<vesting_balance_object_with_info> result;
1685  fc::time_point_sec now = _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties().time;
1686 
1687  if( vbid )
1688  {
1689  result.emplace_back( get_object<vesting_balance_object>(*vbid), now );
1690  return result;
1691  }
1692 
1693  // try casting to avoid a round-trip if we were given an account ID
1694  fc::optional<account_id_type> acct_id = maybe_id<account_id_type>( account_name );
1695  if( !acct_id )
1696  acct_id = get_account( account_name ).id;
1697 
1698  vector< vesting_balance_object > vbos = _remote_db->get_vesting_balances( *acct_id );
1699  if( vbos.size() == 0 )
1700  return result;
1701 
1702  for( const vesting_balance_object& vbo : vbos )
1703  result.emplace_back( vbo, now );
1704 
1705  return result;
1706  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name) )
1707  }
1708 
1709  signed_transaction withdraw_vesting(
1710  string witness_name,
1711  string amount,
1712  string asset_symbol,
1713  bool broadcast = false )
1714  { try {
1715  asset_object asset_obj = get_asset( asset_symbol );
1716  fc::optional<vesting_balance_id_type> vbid = maybe_id<vesting_balance_id_type>(witness_name);
1717  if( !vbid )
1718  {
1719  witness_object wit = get_witness( witness_name );
1720  FC_ASSERT( wit.pay_vb );
1721  vbid = wit.pay_vb;
1722  }
1723 
1724  vesting_balance_object vbo = get_object< vesting_balance_object >( *vbid );
1725  vesting_balance_withdraw_operation vesting_balance_withdraw_op;
1726 
1727  vesting_balance_withdraw_op.vesting_balance = *vbid;
1728  vesting_balance_withdraw_op.owner = vbo.owner;
1729  vesting_balance_withdraw_op.amount = asset_obj.amount_from_string(amount);
1730 
1731  signed_transaction tx;
1732  tx.operations.push_back( vesting_balance_withdraw_op );
1733  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1734  tx.validate();
1735 
1736  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1737  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (witness_name)(amount) )
1738  }

1740  signed_transaction vote_for_committee_member(string voting_account,
1741  string committee_member,
1742  bool approve,
1743  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1744  { try {
1745  account_object voting_account_object = get_account(voting_account);
1746  account_id_type committee_member_owner_account_id = get_account_id(committee_member);
1747  fc::optional<committee_member_object> committee_member_obj = _remote_db->get_committee_member_by_account(committee_member_owner_account_id);
1748  if (!committee_member_obj)
1749  FC_THROW("Account ${committee_member} is not registered as a committee_member", ("committee_member", committee_member));
1750  if (approve)
1751  {
1752  auto insert_result = voting_account_object.options.votes.insert(committee_member_obj->vote_id);
1753  if (!insert_result.second)
1754  FC_THROW("Account ${account} was already voting for committee_member ${committee_member}", ("account", voting_account)("committee_member", committee_member));
1755  }
1756  else
1757  {
1758  unsigned votes_removed = voting_account_object.options.votes.erase(committee_member_obj->vote_id);
1759  if (!votes_removed)
1760  FC_THROW("Account ${account} is already not voting for committee_member ${committee_member}", ("account", voting_account)("committee_member", committee_member));
1761  }
1762  account_update_operation account_update_op;
1763  account_update_op.account = voting_account_object.id;
1764  account_update_op.new_options = voting_account_object.options;
1765 
1766  signed_transaction tx;
1767  tx.operations.push_back( account_update_op );
1768  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1769  tx.validate();
1770 
1771  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1772  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (voting_account)(committee_member)(approve)(broadcast) ) }

1808  signed_transaction set_voting_proxy(string account_to_modify,
1809  optional<string> voting_account,
1810  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1811  { try {
1812  account_object account_object_to_modify = get_account(account_to_modify);
1813  if (voting_account)
1814  {
1815  account_id_type new_voting_account_id = get_account_id(*voting_account);
1816  if (account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account == new_voting_account_id)
1817  FC_THROW("Voting proxy for ${account} is already set to ${voter}", ("account", account_to_modify)("voter", *voting_account));
1818  account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account = new_voting_account_id;
1819  }
1820  else
1821  {
1822  if (account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account == GRAPHENE_PROXY_TO_SELF_ACCOUNT)
1823  FC_THROW("Account ${account} is already voting for itself", ("account", account_to_modify));
1824  account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account = GRAPHENE_PROXY_TO_SELF_ACCOUNT;
1825  }
1826 
1827  account_update_operation account_update_op;
1828  account_update_op.account = account_object_to_modify.id;
1829  account_update_op.new_options = account_object_to_modify.options;
1830 
1831  signed_transaction tx;
1832  tx.operations.push_back( account_update_op );
1833  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1834  tx.validate();
1835 
1836  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1837  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_to_modify)(voting_account)(broadcast) ) }

1860  tx.validate();
1861 
1862  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );

1864 
1865  signed_transaction sign_transaction(signed_transaction tx, bool broadcast = false)
1866  {
1867  set<public_key_type> pks = _remote_db->get_potential_signatures( tx );
1868  flat_set<public_key_type> owned_keys;
1869  owned_keys.reserve( pks.size() );
1870  std::copy_if( pks.begin(), pks.end(), std::inserter(owned_keys, owned_keys.end()),
1871  [this](const public_key_type& pk){ return _keys.find(pk) != _keys.end(); } );
1872  tx.signatures.clear();
1873  set<public_key_type> approving_key_set = _remote_db->get_required_signatures( tx, owned_keys );
1874 
1875  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
1876  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
1877 
1878  // first, some bookkeeping, expire old items from _recently_generated_transactions
1879  // since transactions include the head block id, we just need the index for keeping transactions unique
1880  // when there are multiple transactions in the same block. choose a time period that should be at
1881  // least one block long, even in the worst case. 2 minutes ought to be plenty.
1882  fc::time_point_sec oldest_transaction_ids_to_track(dyn_props.time - fc::minutes(2));
1883  auto oldest_transaction_record_iter = _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().lower_bound(oldest_transaction_ids_to_track);
1884  auto begin_iter = _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().begin();
1885  _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().erase(begin_iter, oldest_transaction_record_iter);
1886 
1887  uint32_t expiration_time_offset = 0;
1888  for (;;)
1889  {
1890  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30 + expiration_time_offset) );
1891  tx.signatures.clear();
1892 
1893  for( const public_key_type& key : approving_key_set )
1894  tx.sign( get_private_key(key), _chain_id );
1895 
1896  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type this_transaction_id = tx.id();
1897  auto iter = _recently_generated_transactions.find(this_transaction_id);
1898  if (iter == _recently_generated_transactions.end())
1899  {
1900  // we haven't generated this transaction before, the usual case
1901  recently_generated_transaction_record this_transaction_record;
1902  this_transaction_record.generation_time = dyn_props.time;
1903  this_transaction_record.transaction_id = this_transaction_id;
1904  _recently_generated_transactions.insert(this_transaction_record);
1905  break;
1906  }
1907 
1908  // else we've generated a dupe, increment expiration time and re-sign it
1909  ++expiration_time_offset;
1910  }
1911 
1912  if( broadcast )
1913  {
1914  try
1915  {
1916  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
1917  }
1918  catch (const fc::exception& e)
1919  {
1920  elog("Caught exception while broadcasting tx ${id}: ${e}", ("id", tx.id().str())("e", e.to_detail_string()) );
1921  throw;
1922  }
1923  }
1924 
1925  return tx;
1926  }
1927 
1928  memo_data sign_memo(string from, string to, string memo)
1929  {
1930  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
1931 
1932  memo_data md = memo_data();
1933 
1934  // get account memo key, if that fails, try a pubkey
1935  try {
1936  account_object from_account = get_account(from);
1937  md.from = from_account.options.memo_key;
1938  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1939  md.from = self.get_public_key( from );
1940  }
1941  // same as above, for destination key
1942  try {
1943  account_object to_account = get_account(to);
1944  md.to = to_account.options.memo_key;
1945  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1946  md.to = self.get_public_key( to );
1947  }
1948 
1949  md.set_message(get_private_key(md.from), md.to, memo);
1950  return md;
1951  }
1952 
1953  string read_memo(const memo_data& md)
1954  {
1955  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
1956  std::string clear_text;
1957 
1958  const memo_data *memo = &md;
1959 
1960  try {
1961  FC_ASSERT(_keys.count(memo->to) || _keys.count(memo->from), "Memo is encrypted to a key ${to} or ${from} not in this wallet.", ("to", memo->to)("from",memo->from));
1962  if( _keys.count(memo->to) ) {
1963  auto my_key = wif_to_key(_keys.at(memo->to));
1964  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
1965  clear_text = memo->get_message(*my_key, memo->from);
1966  } else {
1967  auto my_key = wif_to_key(_keys.at(memo->from));
1968  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
1969  clear_text = memo->get_message(*my_key, memo->to);
1970  }
1971  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1972  elog("Error when decrypting memo: ${e}", ("e", e.to_detail_string()));
1973  }
1974 
1975  return clear_text;
1976  }

1978  signed_transaction sell_asset(string seller_account,
1979  string amount_to_sell,
1980  string symbol_to_sell,
1981  string min_to_receive,
1982  string symbol_to_receive,
1983  uint32_t timeout_sec = 0,
1984  bool fill_or_kill = false,
1985  bool broadcast = false)
1986  {
1987  account_object seller = get_account( seller_account );
1988 
1989  limit_order_create_operation op;
1990  op.seller = seller.id;
1991  op.amount_to_sell = get_asset(symbol_to_sell).amount_from_string(amount_to_sell);
1992  op.min_to_receive = get_asset(symbol_to_receive).amount_from_string(min_to_receive);
1993  if( timeout_sec )
1994  op.expiration = fc::time_point::now() + fc::seconds(timeout_sec);
1995  op.fill_or_kill = fill_or_kill;
1996 
1997  signed_transaction tx;
1998  tx.operations.push_back(op);
1999  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2000  tx.validate();
2001 
2002  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
2003  }

2068  signed_transaction transfer(string from, string to, string amount,
2069  string asset_symbol, string memo, bool broadcast = false)
2070  { try {

2078  account_id_type to_id = get_account_id(to);
2079

2081

2083  xfer_op.to = to_id;
2084  xfer_op.amount = asset_obj->amount_from_string(amount);
2085 
2086  if( memo.size() )
2087  {
2088  xfer_op.memo = memo_data();
2089  xfer_op.memo->from = from_account.options.memo_key;
2090  xfer_op.memo->to = to_account.options.memo_key;
2091  xfer_op.memo->set_message(get_private_key(from_account.options.memo_key),
2092  to_account.options.memo_key, memo);
2093  }
2094 
2095  signed_transaction tx;
2096  tx.operations.push_back(xfer_op);
2097  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2098  tx.validate();
2099 
2100  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2101  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from)(to)(amount)(asset_symbol)(memo)(broadcast) ) }

2133  std::map<string,std::function<string(fc::variant,const fc::variants&)>> get_result_formatters() const
2134  {
2135  std::map<string,std::function<string(fc::variant,const fc::variants&)> > m;
2136  m["help"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2137  {
2138  return result.get_string();
2139  };

2141  m["gethelp"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2142  {
2143  return result.get_string();

2146  m["get_account_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2147  {
2148  auto r = result.as<vector<operation_detail>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2149  std::stringstream ss;
2150 
2151  for( operation_detail& d : r )
2152  {
2153  operation_history_object& i = d.op;
2154  auto b = _remote_db->get_block_header(i.block_num);
2155  FC_ASSERT(b);
2156  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2157  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2158  ss << " \n";
2159  }
2160 
2161  return ss.str();
2162  };
2163  m["get_relative_account_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2164  {
2165  auto r = result.as<vector<operation_detail>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2166  std::stringstream ss;
2167 
2168  for( operation_detail& d : r )
2169  {
2170  operation_history_object& i = d.op;
2171  auto b = _remote_db->get_block_header(i.block_num);
2172  FC_ASSERT(b);
2173  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2174  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2175  ss << " \n";
2176  }
2177 
2178  return ss.str();
2179  };
2180 
2181  m["get_account_history_by_operations"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a) {
2182  auto r = result.as<account_history_operation_detail>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2183  std::stringstream ss;

2185  ss << r.total_count;
2186  ss << " \n";
2187  ss << "result_count : ";
2188  ss << r.result_count;
2189  ss << " \n";

2191  operation_history_object& i = d.op;

2193  FC_ASSERT(b);
2194  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2195  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2196  ss << " transaction_id : ";

2198  ss << " \n";

2200

2202  };

2231  return ss.str();
2232  };
2233  m["transfer_to_blind"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2234  {
2235  auto r = result.as<blind_confirmation>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2236  std::stringstream ss;
2237  r.trx.operations[0].visit( operation_printer( ss, *this, operation_result() ) );
2238  ss << "\n";
2239  for( const auto& out : r.outputs )
2240  {
2241  asset_object a = get_asset( out.decrypted_memo.amount.asset_id );
2242  ss << a.amount_to_pretty_string( out.decrypted_memo.amount ) << " to " << out.label << "\n\t receipt: " << out.confirmation_receipt <<"\n\n";
2243  }
2244  return ss.str();
2245  };
2246  m["blind_transfer"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2247  {
2248  auto r = result.as<blind_confirmation>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2249  std::stringstream ss;
2250  r.trx.operations[0].visit( operation_printer( ss, *this, operation_result() ) );
2251  ss << "\n";
2252  for( const auto& out : r.outputs )
2253  {
2254  asset_object a = get_asset( out.decrypted_memo.amount.asset_id );
2255  ss << a.amount_to_pretty_string( out.decrypted_memo.amount ) << " to " << out.label << "\n\t receipt: " << out.confirmation_receipt <<"\n\n";
2256  }
2257  return ss.str();
2258  };
2259  m["receive_blind_transfer"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2260  {
2261  auto r = result.as<blind_receipt>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2262  std::stringstream ss;
2263  asset_object as = get_asset( r.amount.asset_id );
2264  ss << as.amount_to_pretty_string( r.amount ) << " " << r.from_label << " => " << r.to_label << " " << r.memo <<"\n";
2265  return ss.str();
2266  };
2267  m["blind_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2268  {
2269  auto records = result.as<vector<blind_receipt>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2270  std::stringstream ss;
2271  ss << "WHEN "
2272  << " " << "AMOUNT" << " " << "FROM" << " => " << "TO" << " " << "MEMO" <<"\n";
2273  ss << "====================================================================================\n";
2274  for( auto& r : records )
2275  {
2276  asset_object as = get_asset( r.amount.asset_id );
2277  ss << fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( r.date )
2278  << " " << as.amount_to_pretty_string( r.amount ) << " " << r.from_label << " => " << r.to_label << " " << r.memo <<"\n";
2279  }
2280  return ss.str();
2281  };
2282  m["get_order_book"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2283  {
2284  auto orders = result.as<order_book>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2285  auto bids = orders.bids;
2286  auto asks = orders.asks;
2287  std::stringstream ss;
2288  std::stringstream sum_stream;
2289  sum_stream << "Sum(" << orders.base << ')';
2290  double bid_sum = 0;
2291  double ask_sum = 0;
2292  const int spacing = 20;
2293 
2294  auto prettify_num = [&ss]( double n )
2295  {
2296  if (abs( round( n ) - n ) < 0.00000000001 )
2297  {
2298  ss << (int) n;
2299  }
2300  else if (n - floor(n) < 0.000001)
2301  {
2302  ss << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setprecision(10) << n;
2303  }
2304  else
2305  {
2306  ss << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setprecision(6) << n;
2307  }
2308  };
2309  auto prettify_num_string = [&]( string& num_string )
2310  {
2311  double n = fc::to_double( num_string );
2312  prettify_num( n );
2313  };
2314 
2315  ss << setprecision( 8 ) << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setiosflags( ios::left );
2316 
2317  ss << ' ' << setw( (spacing * 4) + 6 ) << "BUY ORDERS" << "SELL ORDERS\n"
2318  << ' ' << setw( spacing + 1 ) << "Price" << setw( spacing ) << orders.quote << ' ' << setw( spacing )
2319  << orders.base << ' ' << setw( spacing ) << sum_stream.str()
2320  << " " << setw( spacing + 1 ) << "Price" << setw( spacing ) << orders.quote << ' ' << setw( spacing )
2321  << orders.base << ' ' << setw( spacing ) << sum_stream.str()
2322  << "\n====================================================================================="
2323  << "|=====================================================================================\n";
2324 
2325  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bids.size() || i < asks.size() ; i++)
2326  {
2327  if ( i < bids.size() )
2328  {
2329  bid_sum += fc::to_double( bids[i].base );
2330  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2331  prettify_num_string( bids[i].price );
2332  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2333  prettify_num_string( bids[i].quote );
2334  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2335  prettify_num_string( bids[i].base );
2336  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2337  prettify_num( bid_sum );
2338  ss << ' ';
2339  }
2340  else
2341  {
2342  ss << setw( (spacing * 4) + 5 ) << ' ';
2343  }
2344 
2345  ss << '|';
2346 
2347  if ( i < asks.size() )
2348  {
2349  ask_sum += fc::to_double( asks[i].base );
2350  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2351  prettify_num_string( asks[i].price );
2352  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2353  prettify_num_string( asks[i].quote );
2354  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2355  prettify_num_string( asks[i].base );
2356  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2357  prettify_num( ask_sum );
2358  }
2359 
2360  ss << '\n';
2361  }
2362 
2363  ss << endl
2364  << "Buy Total: " << bid_sum << ' ' << orders.base << endl
2365  << "Sell Total: " << ask_sum << ' ' << orders.base << endl;
2366 
2367  return ss.str();
2368  };
2369 
2370  return m;
2371  }

2373  signed_transaction propose_parameter_change(
2374  const string& proposing_account,
2375  fc::time_point_sec expiration_time,
2376  const variant_object& changed_values,
2377  bool broadcast = false)
2378  {
2379  FC_ASSERT( !changed_values.contains("current_fees") );
2380 
2381  const chain_parameters& current_params = get_global_properties().parameters;
2382  chain_parameters new_params = current_params;
2383  fc::reflector<chain_parameters>::visit(
2384  fc::from_variant_visitor<chain_parameters>( changed_values, new_params, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS )
2385  );
2386 
2387  committee_member_update_global_parameters_operation update_op;
2388  update_op.new_parameters = new_params;
2389 
2390  proposal_create_operation prop_op;
2391 
2392  prop_op.expiration_time = expiration_time;
2393  prop_op.review_period_seconds = current_params.committee_proposal_review_period;
2394  prop_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(proposing_account).id;
2395 
2396  prop_op.proposed_ops.emplace_back( update_op );
2397  current_params.current_fees->set_fee( prop_op.proposed_ops.back().op );
2398 
2399  signed_transaction tx;
2400  tx.operations.push_back(prop_op);
2401  set_operation_fees(tx, current_params.current_fees);
2402  tx.validate();
2403 
2404  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2405  }
2406 
2407  signed_transaction propose_fee_change(
2408  const string& proposing_account,
2409  fc::time_point_sec expiration_time,
2410  const variant_object& changed_fees,
2411  bool broadcast = false)
2412  {
2413  const chain_parameters& current_params = get_global_properties().parameters;
2414  const fee_schedule_type& current_fees = *(current_params.current_fees);
2415 
2416  flat_map< int, fee_parameters > fee_map;
2417  fee_map.reserve( current_fees.parameters.size() );
2418  for( const fee_parameters& op_fee : current_fees.parameters )
2419  fee_map[ op_fee.which() ] = op_fee;
2420  uint32_t scale = current_fees.scale;
2421 
2422  for( const auto& item : changed_fees )
2423  {
2424  const string& key = item.key();
2425  if( key == "scale" )
2426  {
2427  int64_t _scale = item.value().as_int64();
2428  FC_ASSERT( _scale >= 0 );
2429  FC_ASSERT( _scale <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max() );
2430  scale = uint32_t( _scale );
2431  continue;
2432  }
2433  // is key a number?
2434  auto is_numeric = [&key]() -> bool
2435  {
2436  size_t n = key.size();
2437  for( size_t i=0; i<n; i++ )
2438  {
2439  if( !isdigit( key[i] ) )
2440  return false;
2441  }
2442  return true;
2443  };
2444 
2445  int which;
2446  if( is_numeric() )
2447  which = std::stoi( key );
2448  else
2449  {
2450  const auto& n2w = _operation_which_map.name_to_which;
2451  auto it = n2w.find( key );
2452  FC_ASSERT( it != n2w.end(), "unknown operation" );
2453  which = it->second;
2454  }
2455 
2456  fee_parameters fp = from_which_variant< fee_parameters >( which, item.value(), GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2457  fee_map[ which ] = fp;
2458  }
2459 
2460  fee_schedule_type new_fees;
2461 
2462  for( const std::pair< int, fee_parameters >& item : fee_map )
2463  new_fees.parameters.insert( item.second );
2464  new_fees.scale = scale;
2465 
2466  chain_parameters new_params = current_params;
2467  new_params.current_fees = new_fees;
2468 
2469  committee_member_update_global_parameters_operation update_op;
2470  update_op.new_parameters = new_params;
2471 
2472  proposal_create_operation prop_op;
2473 
2474  prop_op.expiration_time = expiration_time;
2475  prop_op.review_period_seconds = current_params.committee_proposal_review_period;
2476  prop_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(proposing_account).id;
2477 
2478  prop_op.proposed_ops.emplace_back( update_op );
2479  current_params.current_fees->set_fee( prop_op.proposed_ops.back().op );
2480 
2481  signed_transaction tx;
2482  tx.operations.push_back(prop_op);
2483  set_operation_fees(tx, current_params.current_fees);
2484  tx.validate();
2485 
2486  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2487  }

2489  signed_transaction approve_proposal(
2490  const string& fee_paying_account,
2491  const string& proposal_id,
2492  const approval_delta& delta,
2493  bool broadcast = false)
2494  {
2495  proposal_update_operation update_op;
2496 
2497  update_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(fee_paying_account).id;
2498  update_op.proposal = fc::variant(proposal_id, 1).as<proposal_id_type>( 1 );
2499  // make sure the proposal exists
2500  get_object( update_op.proposal );
2501 
2502  for( const std::string& name : delta.active_approvals_to_add )
2503  update_op.active_approvals_to_add.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2504  for( const std::string& name : delta.active_approvals_to_remove )
2505  update_op.active_approvals_to_remove.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2506  for( const std::string& name : delta.owner_approvals_to_add )
2507  update_op.owner_approvals_to_add.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2508  for( const std::string& name : delta.owner_approvals_to_remove )
2509  update_op.owner_approvals_to_remove.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2510  for( const std::string& k : delta.key_approvals_to_add )
2511  update_op.key_approvals_to_add.insert( public_key_type( k ) );
2512  for( const std::string& k : delta.key_approvals_to_remove )
2513  update_op.key_approvals_to_remove.insert( public_key_type( k ) );
2514 
2515  signed_transaction tx;
2516  tx.operations.push_back(update_op);
2517  set_operation_fees(tx, get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2518  tx.validate();
2519  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2520  }

2631  void flood_network(string prefix, uint32_t number_of_transactions)
2632  {
2633  try
2634  {
2635  const account_object& master = *_wallet.my_accounts.get<by_name>().lower_bound("import");
2636  int number_of_accounts = number_of_transactions / 3;
2637  number_of_transactions -= number_of_accounts;
2638  try {
2639  dbg_make_uia(master.name, "SHILL");
2640  } catch(...) {/* Ignore; the asset probably already exists.*/}
2641 
2642  fc::time_point start = fc::time_point::now();
2643  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2644  {
2645  std::ostringstream brain_key;
2646  brain_key << "brain key for account " << prefix << i;
2647  signed_transaction trx = create_account_with_brain_key(brain_key.str(), prefix + fc::to_string(i), master.name, master.name, /* broadcast = */ true, /* save wallet = */ false);
2648  }
2649  fc::time_point end = fc::time_point::now();
2650  ilog("Created ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2651  ("n", number_of_accounts)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2652 
2653  start = fc::time_point::now();
2654  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2655  {
2656  signed_transaction trx = transfer(master.name, prefix + fc::to_string(i), "10", "CORE", "", true);
2657  trx = transfer(master.name, prefix + fc::to_string(i), "1", "CORE", "", true);
2658  }
2659  end = fc::time_point::now();
2660  ilog("Transferred to ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2661  ("n", number_of_accounts*2)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2662 
2663  start = fc::time_point::now();
2664  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2665  {
2666  signed_transaction trx = issue_asset(prefix + fc::to_string(i), "1000", "SHILL", "", true);
2667  }
2668  end = fc::time_point::now();
2669  ilog("Issued to ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2670  ("n", number_of_accounts)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2671  }
2672  catch (...)
2673  {
2674  throw;
2675  }
2676 
2677  }

2716 template<typename T>
2717 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const T& op)const
2718 {
2719  //balance_accumulator acc;
2720  //op.get_balance_delta( acc, result );
2721  auto a = wallet.get_asset( op.fee.asset_id );
2722  auto payer = wallet.get_account( op.fee_payer() );
2723 
2724  string op_name = fc::get_typename<T>::name();
2725  if( op_name.find_last_of(':') != string::npos )
2726  op_name.erase(0, op_name.find_last_of(':')+1);
2727  out << op_name <<" ";
2728  // out << "balance delta: " << fc::json::to_string(acc.balance) <<" ";
2729  out << payer.name << " fee: " << a.amount_to_pretty_string( op.fee );
2730  operation_result_printer rprinter(wallet);
2731  std::string str_result = result.visit(rprinter);
2732  if( str_result != "" )
2733  {
2734  out << " result: " << str_result;
2735  }
2736  return "";
2737 }
2738 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_from_blind_operation& op)const
2739 {
2740  auto a = wallet.get_asset( op.fee.asset_id );
2741  auto receiver = wallet.get_account( op.to );
2742 
2743  out << receiver.name
2744  << " received " << a.amount_to_pretty_string( op.amount ) << " from blinded balance";
2745  return "";
2746 }
2747 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_to_blind_operation& op)const
2748 {
2749  auto fa = wallet.get_asset( op.fee.asset_id );
2750  auto a = wallet.get_asset( op.amount.asset_id );
2751  auto sender = wallet.get_account( op.from );
2752 
2753  out << sender.name
2754  << " sent " << a.amount_to_pretty_string( op.amount ) << " to " << op.outputs.size() << " blinded balance" << (op.outputs.size()>1?"s":"")
2755  << " fee: " << fa.amount_to_pretty_string( op.fee );
2756  return "";
2757 }
2758 string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_operation& op) const
2759 {
2760  out << "Transfer " << wallet.get_asset(op.amount.asset_id).amount_to_pretty_string(op.amount)
2761  << " from " << wallet.get_account(op.from).name << " to " << wallet.get_account(op.to).name;
2762  std::string memo;
2763  if( op.memo )
2764  {
2765  if( wallet.is_locked() )
2766  {
2767  out << " -- Unlock wallet to see memo.";
2768  } else {
2769  try {
2770  FC_ASSERT(wallet._keys.count(op.memo->to) || wallet._keys.count(op.memo->from), "Memo is encrypted to a key ${to} or ${from} not in this wallet.", ("to", op.memo->to)("from",op.memo->from));
2771  if( wallet._keys.count(op.memo->to) ) {
2772  auto my_key = wif_to_key(wallet._keys.at(op.memo->to));
2773  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
2774  memo = op.memo->get_message(*my_key, op.memo->from);
2775  out << " -- Memo: " << memo;
2776  } else {
2777  auto my_key = wif_to_key(wallet._keys.at(op.memo->from));
2778  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
2779  memo = op.memo->get_message(*my_key, op.memo->to);
2780  out << " -- Memo: " << memo;
2781  }
2782  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
2783  out << " -- could not decrypt memo";
2784  }
2785  }
2786  }
2787  fee(op.fee);
2788  return memo;
2789 }

2793  out << "Create Account '" << op.name << "'";

2832  vector<brain_key_info> utility::derive_owner_keys_from_brain_key(string brain_key, int number_of_desired_keys)
2833  {
2834  // Safety-check
2835  FC_ASSERT( number_of_desired_keys >= 1 );
2836 
2837  // Create as many derived owner keys as requested
2838  vector<brain_key_info> results;
2839  brain_key = graphene::wallet::detail::normalize_brain_key(brain_key);
2840  for (int i = 0; i < number_of_desired_keys; ++i) {
2841  fc::ecc::private_key priv_key = graphene::wallet::detail::derive_private_key( brain_key, i );
2842 
2843  brain_key_info result;
2844  result.brain_priv_key = brain_key;
2845  result.wif_priv_key = key_to_wif( priv_key );
2846  result.pub_key = priv_key.get_public_key();
2847 
2848  results.push_back(result);
2849  }
2850 
2851  return results;
2852  }
2853 }}

2903 vector<operation_detail> wallet_api::get_account_history(string name, int limit)const
2904 {
2905  vector<operation_detail> result;
2906  auto account_id = get_account(name).get_id();
2907 
2908  while( limit > 0 )
2909  {
2910  operation_history_id_type start;
2911  if( result.size() )
2912  {
2913  start = result.back().op.id;
2914  start = start + 1;
2915  }
2916 
2917 
2918  vector<operation_history_object> current = my->_remote_hist->get_account_history(account_id, operation_history_id_type(), std::min(100,limit), start);
2919  for( auto& o : current ) {
2920  std::stringstream ss;
2921  auto memo = o.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, o.result));
2922  result.push_back( operation_detail{ memo, ss.str(), o } );
2923  }
2924  if( int(current.size()) < std::min(100,limit) )
2925  break;
2926  limit -= current.size();
2927  }
2928 
2929  return result;
2930 }

2932 vector<operation_detail> wallet_api::get_relative_account_history(string name, uint32_t stop, int limit, uint32_t start)const
2933 {
2934  vector<operation_detail> result;
2935  auto account_id = get_account(name).get_id();
2936 
2937  const account_object& account = my->get_account(account_id);
2938  const account_statistics_object& stats = my->get_object(account.statistics);
2939 
2940  if(start == 0)
2941  start = stats.total_ops;
2942  else
2943  start = std::min<uint32_t>(start, stats.total_ops);
2944 
2945  while( limit > 0 )
2946  {
2947  vector <operation_history_object> current = my->_remote_hist->get_relative_account_history(account_id, stop, std::min<uint32_t>(100, limit), start);
2948  for (auto &o : current) {
2949  std::stringstream ss;
2950  auto memo = o.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, o.result));
2951  result.push_back(operation_detail{memo, ss.str(), o});
2952  }
2953  if (current.size() < std::min<uint32_t>(100, limit))
2954  break;
2955  limit -= current.size();
2956  start -= 100;
2957  if( start == 0 ) break;
2958  }
2959  return result;
2960 }
2961 
2962 account_history_operation_detail wallet_api::get_account_history_by_operations(string name, vector<uint16_t> operation_types, uint32_t start, int limit)
2963 {
2964  account_history_operation_detail result;
2965  auto account_id = get_account(name).get_id();
2966 
2967  const auto& account = my->get_account(account_id);
2968  const auto& stats = my->get_object(account.statistics);
2969 
2970  // sequence of account_transaction_history_object start with 1
2971  start = start == 0 ? 1 : start;
2972 
2973  if (start <= stats.removed_ops) {
2974  start = stats.removed_ops;
2975  result.total_count =stats.removed_ops;
2976  }
2977 
2978  while (limit > 0 && start <= stats.total_ops) {
2979  uint32_t min_limit = std::min<uint32_t> (100, limit);
2980  auto current = my->_remote_hist->get_account_history_by_operations(account_id, operation_types, start, min_limit);
2981  for (auto& obj : current.operation_history_objs) {
2982  std::stringstream ss;
2983  auto memo = obj.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, obj.result));
2984 
2985  transaction_id_type transaction_id;
2986  auto block = get_block(obj.block_num);
2987  if (block.valid() && obj.trx_in_block < block->transaction_ids.size()) {
2988  transaction_id = block->transaction_ids[obj.trx_in_block];
2989  }
2990  result.details.push_back(operation_detail_ex{memo, ss.str(), obj, transaction_id});
2991  }
2992  result.result_count += current.operation_history_objs.size();
2993  result.total_count += current.total_count;
2994 
2995  start += current.total_count > 0 ? current.total_count : min_limit;
2996  limit -= current.operation_history_objs.size();
2997  }
2998 
2999  return result;
3000 }
