3032 brain_key_info wallet_api::suggest_brain_key()const
3033 {
3034  brain_key_info result;
3035  // create a private key for secure entropy
3036  fc::sha256 sha_entropy1 = fc::ecc::private_key::generate().get_secret();
3037  fc::sha256 sha_entropy2 = fc::ecc::private_key::generate().get_secret();
3038  fc::bigint entropy1( sha_entropy1.data(), sha_entropy1.data_size() );
3039  fc::bigint entropy2( sha_entropy2.data(), sha_entropy2.data_size() );
3040  fc::bigint entropy(entropy1);
3041  entropy <<= 8*sha_entropy1.data_size();
3042  entropy += entropy2;
3043  string brain_key = "";
3044 
3045  for( int i=0; i<BRAIN_KEY_WORD_COUNT; i++ )
3046  {
3047  fc::bigint choice = entropy % graphene::words::word_list_size;
3048  entropy /= graphene::words::word_list_size;
3049  if( i > 0 )
3050  brain_key += " ";
3051  brain_key += graphene::words::word_list[ choice.to_int64() ];
3052  }
3053 
3054  brain_key = normalize_brain_key(brain_key);
3055  fc::ecc::private_key priv_key = derive_private_key( brain_key, 0 );
3056  result.brain_priv_key = brain_key;
3057  result.wif_priv_key = key_to_wif( priv_key );
3058  result.pub_key = priv_key.get_public_key();
3059  return result;
3060 }
3061

3177 bool wallet_api::import_key(string account_name_or_id, string wif_key)
3178 {
3179  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
3180  // backup wallet
3181  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> optional_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
3182  if (!optional_private_key)
3183  FC_THROW("Invalid private key");
3184  string shorthash = detail::address_to_shorthash(optional_private_key->get_public_key());
3185  copy_wallet_file( "before-import-key-" + shorthash );
3186 
3187  if( my->import_key(account_name_or_id, wif_key) )
3188  {
3189  save_wallet_file();
3190  copy_wallet_file( "after-import-key-" + shorthash );
3191  return true;
3192  }
3193  return false;
3194 }

3196 map<string, bool> wallet_api::import_accounts( string filename, string password )
3197 {
3198  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3199  FC_ASSERT( fc::exists( filename ) );
3200 
3201  const auto imported_keys = fc::json::from_file<exported_keys>( filename );
3202 
3203  const auto password_hash = fc::sha512::hash( password );
3204  FC_ASSERT( fc::sha512::hash( password_hash ) == imported_keys.password_checksum );
3205 
3206  map<string, bool> result;
3207  for( const auto& item : imported_keys.account_keys )
3208  {
3209  const auto import_this_account = [ & ]() -> bool
3210  {
3211  try
3212  {
3213  const account_object account = get_account( item.account_name );
3214  const auto& owner_keys = account.owner.get_keys();
3215  const auto& active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
3216 
3217  for( const auto& public_key : item.public_keys )
3218  {
3219  if( std::find( owner_keys.begin(), owner_keys.end(), public_key ) != owner_keys.end() )
3220  return true;
3221 
3222  if( std::find( active_keys.begin(), active_keys.end(), public_key ) != active_keys.end() )
3223  return true;
3224  }
3225  }
3226  catch( ... )
3227  {
3228  }
3229 
3230  return false;
3231  };
3232 
3233  const auto should_proceed = import_this_account();
3234  result[ item.account_name ] = should_proceed;
3235 
3236  if( should_proceed )
3237  {
3238  uint32_t import_successes = 0;
3239  uint32_t import_failures = 0;
3240  // TODO: First check that all private keys match public keys
3241  for( const auto& encrypted_key : item.encrypted_private_keys )
3242  {
3243  try
3244  {
3245  const auto plain_text = fc::aes_decrypt( password_hash, encrypted_key );
3246  const auto private_key = fc::raw::unpack<private_key_type>( plain_text );
3247 
3248  import_key( item.account_name, string( graphene::utilities::key_to_wif( private_key ) ) );
3249  ++import_successes;
3250  }
3251  catch( const fc::exception& e )
3252  {
3253  elog( "Couldn't import key due to exception ${e}", ("e", e.to_detail_string()) );
3254  ++import_failures;
3255  }
3256  }
3257  ilog( "successfully imported ${n} keys for account ${name}", ("n", import_successes)("name", item.account_name) );
3258  if( import_failures > 0 )
3259  elog( "failed to import ${n} keys for account ${name}", ("n", import_failures)("name", item.account_name) );
3260  }
3261  }
3262 
3263  return result;
3264 }

3266 bool wallet_api::import_account_keys( string filename, string password, string src_account_name, string dest_account_name )
3267 {
3268  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3269  FC_ASSERT( fc::exists( filename ) );
3270 
3271  bool is_my_account = false;
3272  const auto accounts = list_my_accounts();
3273  for( const auto& account : accounts )
3274  {
3275  if( account.name == dest_account_name )
3276  {
3277  is_my_account = true;
3278  break;
3279  }
3280  }
3281  FC_ASSERT( is_my_account );
3282 
3283  const auto imported_keys = fc::json::from_file<exported_keys>( filename );
3284 
3285  const auto password_hash = fc::sha512::hash( password );
3286  FC_ASSERT( fc::sha512::hash( password_hash ) == imported_keys.password_checksum );
3287 
3288  bool found_account = false;
3289  for( const auto& item : imported_keys.account_keys )
3290  {
3291  if( item.account_name != src_account_name )
3292  continue;
3293 
3294  found_account = true;
3295 
3296  for( const auto& encrypted_key : item.encrypted_private_keys )
3297  {
3298  const auto plain_text = fc::aes_decrypt( password_hash, encrypted_key );
3299  const auto private_key = fc::raw::unpack<private_key_type>( plain_text );
3300 
3301  my->import_key( dest_account_name, string( graphene::utilities::key_to_wif( private_key ) ) );
3302  }
3303 
3304  return true;
3305  }
3306  save_wallet_file();
3307 
3308  FC_ASSERT( found_account );
3309 
3310  return false;
3311 }

3363 signed_transaction wallet_api::create_asset(string issuer,
3364  string symbol,
3365  uint8_t precision,
3366  asset_options common,
3367  fc::optional<bitasset_options> bitasset_opts,
3368  bool broadcast)

3678 string wallet_api::help()const
3679 {
3680  std::vector<std::string> method_names = my->method_documentation.get_method_names();
3681  std::stringstream ss;
3682  for (const std::string method_name : method_names)
3683  {
3684  try
3685  {
3686  ss << my->method_documentation.get_brief_description(method_name);
3687  }
3688  catch (const fc::key_not_found_exception&)
3689  {
3690  ss << method_name << " (no help available)\n";
3691  }
3692  }
3693  return ss.str();
3694 }
3695 
3696 string wallet_api::gethelp(const string& method)const
3697 {
3698  fc::api<wallet_api> tmp;
3699  std::stringstream ss;
3700  ss << "\n";
3701 
3702  if( method == "import_key" )
3703  {
3704  ss << "usage: import_key ACCOUNT_NAME_OR_ID WIF_PRIVATE_KEY\n\n";
3705  ss << "example: import_key \"1.3.11\" 5KQwrPbwdL6PhXujxW37FSSQZ1JiwsST4cqQzDeyXtP79zkvFD3\n";
3706  ss << "example: import_key \"usera\" 5KQwrPbwdL6PhXujxW37FSSQZ1JiwsST4cqQzDeyXtP79zkvFD3\n";
3707  }
3708  else if( method == "transfer" )
3709  {
3710  ss << "usage: transfer FROM TO AMOUNT SYMBOL \"memo\" BROADCAST\n\n";
3711  ss << "example: transfer \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.4\" 1000.03 CORE \"memo\" true\n";
3712  ss << "example: transfer \"usera\" \"userb\" 1000.123 CORE \"memo\" true\n";
3713  }
3714  else if( method == "create_account_with_brain_key" )
3715  {
3716  ss << "usage: create_account_with_brain_key BRAIN_KEY ACCOUNT_NAME REGISTRAR REFERRER BROADCAST\n\n";
3717  ss << "example: create_account_with_brain_key \"my really long brain key\" \"newaccount\" \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.11\" true\n";
3718  ss << "example: create_account_with_brain_key \"my really long brain key\" \"newaccount\" \"someaccount\" \"otheraccount\" true\n";
3719  ss << "\n";
3720  ss << "This method should be used if you would like the wallet to generate new keys derived from the brain key.\n";
3721  ss << "The BRAIN_KEY will be used as the owner key, and the active key will be derived from the BRAIN_KEY. Use\n";
3722  ss << "register_account if you already know the keys you know the public keys that you would like to register.\n";
3723 
3724  }
3725  else if( method == "register_account" )
3726  {
3727  ss << "usage: register_account ACCOUNT_NAME OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY REGISTRAR REFERRER REFERRER_PERCENT BROADCAST\n\n";
3728  ss << "example: register_account \"newaccount\" \"CORE6MRyAjQq8ud7hVNYcfnVPJqcVpscN5So8BhtHuGYqET5GDW5CV\" \"CORE6MRyAjQq8ud7hVNYcfnVPJqcVpscN5So8BhtHuGYqET5GDW5CV\" \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.11\" 50 true\n";
3729  ss << "\n";
3730  ss << "Use this method to register an account for which you do not know the private keys.";
3731  }
3732  else if( method == "create_asset" )
3733  {
3734  ss << "usage: ISSUER SYMBOL PRECISION_DIGITS OPTIONS BITASSET_OPTIONS BROADCAST\n\n";
3735  ss << "PRECISION_DIGITS: the number of digits after the decimal point\n\n";
3736  ss << "Example value of OPTIONS: \n";
3737  ss << fc::json::to_pretty_string( graphene::chain::asset_options() );
3738  ss << "\nExample value of BITASSET_OPTIONS: \n";
3739  ss << fc::json::to_pretty_string( graphene::chain::bitasset_options() );
3740  ss << "\nBITASSET_OPTIONS may be null\n";
3741  }
3742  else
3743  {
3744  std::string doxygenHelpString = my->method_documentation.get_detailed_description(method);
3745  if (!doxygenHelpString.empty())
3746  ss << doxygenHelpString;
3747  else
3748  ss << "No help defined for method " << method << "\n";
3749  }
3750 
3751  return ss.str();
3752 }

3783 
3784 void wallet_api::lock()
3785 { try {
3786  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3787  encrypt_keys();
3788  for( auto key : my->_keys )
3789  key.second = key_to_wif(fc::ecc::private_key());
3790  my->_keys.clear();
3791  my->_checksum = fc::sha512();
3792  my->self.lock_changed(true);
3793 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW() }
3794 
3795 void wallet_api::unlock(string password)
3796 { try {
3797  FC_ASSERT(password.size() > 0);
3798  auto pw = fc::sha512::hash(password.c_str(), password.size());
3799  vector<char> decrypted = fc::aes_decrypt(pw, my->_wallet.cipher_keys);
3800  auto pk = fc::raw::unpack<plain_keys>(decrypted);
3801  FC_ASSERT(pk.checksum == pw);
3802  my->_keys = std::move(pk.keys);
3803  my->_checksum = pk.checksum;
3804  my->self.lock_changed(false);
3805 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW() }
3806 
3807 void wallet_api::set_password( string password )
3808 {
3809  if( !is_new() )
3810  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked(), "The wallet must be unlocked before the password can be set" );
3811  my->_checksum = fc::sha512::hash( password.c_str(), password.size() );
3812  lock();
3813 }

3815 vector< signed_transaction > wallet_api::import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast )
3816 {
3817  return my->import_balance( name_or_id, wif_keys, broadcast );
3818 }
3819 
3820 namespace detail {
3821 
3822 vector< signed_transaction > wallet_api_impl::import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast )
3823 { try {
3824  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
3825  const dynamic_global_property_object& dpo = _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties();
3826  account_object claimer = get_account( name_or_id );
3827  uint32_t max_ops_per_tx = 30;
3828 
3829  map< address, private_key_type > keys; // local index of address -> private key
3830  vector< address > addrs;
3831  bool has_wildcard = false;
3832  addrs.reserve( wif_keys.size() );
3833  for( const string& wif_key : wif_keys )
3834  {
3835  if( wif_key == "*" )
3836  {
3837  if( has_wildcard )
3838  continue;
3839  for( const public_key_type& pub : _wallet.extra_keys[ claimer.id ] )
3840  {
3841  addrs.push_back( pub );
3842  auto it = _keys.find( pub );
3843  if( it != _keys.end() )
3844  {
3845  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
3846  FC_ASSERT( privkey );
3847  keys[ addrs.back() ] = *privkey;
3848  }
3849  else
3850  {
3851  wlog( "Somehow _keys has no private key for extra_keys public key ${k}", ("k", pub) );
3852  }
3853  }
3854  has_wildcard = true;
3855  }
3856  else
3857  {
3858  optional< private_key_type > key = wif_to_key( wif_key );
3859  FC_ASSERT( key.valid(), "Invalid private key" );
3860  fc::ecc::public_key pk = key->get_public_key();
3861  addrs.push_back( pk );
3862  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3863  // see chain/balance_evaluator.cpp
3864  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, false, 56 ) );
3865  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3866  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, true, 56 ) );
3867  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3868  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, false, 0 ) );
3869  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3870  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, true, 0 ) );
3871  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3872  }
3873  }
3874 
3875  vector< balance_object > balances = _remote_db->get_balance_objects( addrs );
3876  addrs.clear();
3877 
3878  set<asset_id_type> bal_types;
3879  for( auto b : balances ) bal_types.insert( b.balance.asset_id );
3880 
3881  struct claim_tx
3882  {
3883  vector< balance_claim_operation > ops;
3884  set< address > addrs;
3885  };
3886  vector< claim_tx > claim_txs;
3887 
3888  for( const asset_id_type& a : bal_types )
3889  {
3890  balance_claim_operation op;
3891  op.deposit_to_account = claimer.id;
3892  for( const balance_object& b : balances )
3893  {
3894  if( b.balance.asset_id == a )
3895  {
3896  op.total_claimed = b.available( dpo.time );
3897  if( op.total_claimed.amount == 0 )
3898  continue;
3899  op.balance_to_claim = b.id;
3900  op.balance_owner_key = keys[b.owner].get_public_key();
3901  if( (claim_txs.empty()) || (claim_txs.back().ops.size() >= max_ops_per_tx) )
3902  claim_txs.emplace_back();
3903  claim_txs.back().ops.push_back(op);
3904  claim_txs.back().addrs.insert(b.owner);
3905  }
3906  }
3907  }
3908 
3909  vector< signed_transaction > result;
3910 
3911  for( const claim_tx& ctx : claim_txs )
3912  {
3913  signed_transaction tx;
3914  tx.operations.reserve( ctx.ops.size() );
3915  for( const balance_claim_operation& op : ctx.ops )
3916  tx.operations.emplace_back( op );
3917  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
3918  tx.validate();
3919  signed_transaction signed_tx = sign_transaction( tx, false );
3920  for( const address& addr : ctx.addrs )
3921  signed_tx.sign( keys[addr], _chain_id );
3922  // if the key for a balance object was the same as a key for the account we're importing it into,
3923  // we may end up with duplicate signatures, so remove those
3924  boost::erase(signed_tx.signatures, boost::unique<boost::return_found_end>(boost::sort(signed_tx.signatures)));
3925  result.push_back( signed_tx );
3926  if( broadcast )
3927  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction(signed_tx);
3928  }
3929 
3930  return result;
3931 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name_or_id) ) }
3932 
3933 }

3959 signed_transaction wallet_api::borrow_asset(string seller_name, string amount_to_sell,
3960  string asset_symbol, string amount_of_collateral, bool broadcast)
3961 {

4069 vector<asset> wallet_api::get_blind_balances( string key_or_label )
4070 {
4071  vector<asset> result;
4072  map<asset_id_type, share_type> balances;
4073 
4074  vector<commitment_type> used;
4075 
4076  auto pub_key = get_public_key( key_or_label );
4077  auto& to_asset_used_idx = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_to_asset_used>();
4078  auto start = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(pub_key,asset_id_type(0),false) );
4079  auto end = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(pub_key,asset_id_type(uint32_t(0xffffffff)),true) );
4080  while( start != end )
4081  {
4082  if( !start->used )
4083  {
4084  auto answer = my->_remote_db->get_blinded_balances( {start->commitment()} );
4085  if( answer.size() )
4086  balances[start->amount.asset_id] += start->amount.amount;
4087  else
4088  used.push_back( start->commitment() );
4089  }
4090  ++start;
4091  }
4092  for( const auto& u : used )
4093  {
4094  auto itr = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_commitment>().find( u );
4095  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.modify( itr, []( blind_receipt& r ){ r.used = true; } );
4096  }
4097  for( auto item : balances )
4098  result.push_back( asset( item.second, item.first ) );
4099  return result;
4100 }

4160 
4161 blind_confirmation wallet_api::blind_transfer( string from_key_or_label,
4162  string to_key_or_label,
4163  string amount_in,
4164  string symbol,
4165  bool broadcast )
4166 {
4167  return blind_transfer_help( from_key_or_label, to_key_or_label, amount_in, symbol, broadcast, false );

4169 blind_confirmation wallet_api::blind_transfer_help( string from_key_or_label,
4170  string to_key_or_label,
4171  string amount_in,
4172  string symbol,
4173  bool broadcast,
4174  bool to_temp )
4175 {
4176  blind_confirmation confirm;
4177  try {
4178 
4179  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4180  public_key_type from_key = get_public_key(from_key_or_label);
4181  public_key_type to_key = get_public_key(to_key_or_label);
4182 
4183  fc::optional<asset_object> asset_obj = get_asset(symbol);
4184  FC_ASSERT(asset_obj.valid(), "Could not find asset matching ${asset}", ("asset", symbol));
4185 
4186  blind_transfer_operation blind_tr;
4187  blind_tr.outputs.resize(2);
4188 
4189  auto fees = my->_remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees;
4190 
4191  auto amount = asset_obj->amount_from_string(amount_in);
4192 
4193  asset total_amount = asset_obj->amount(0);
4194 
4195  vector<fc::sha256> blinding_factors;
4196 
4197  //auto from_priv_key = my->get_private_key( from_key );
4198 
4199  blind_tr.fee = fees->calculate_fee( blind_tr, asset_obj->options.core_exchange_rate );
4200 
4201  vector<commitment_type> used;
4202 
4203  auto& to_asset_used_idx = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_to_asset_used>();
4204  auto start = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(from_key,amount.asset_id,false) );
4205  auto end = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(from_key,amount.asset_id,true) );
4206  while( start != end )
4207  {
4208  auto result = my->_remote_db->get_blinded_balances( {start->commitment() } );
4209  if( result.size() == 0 )
4210  {
4211  used.push_back( start->commitment() );
4212  }
4213  else
4214  {
4215  blind_tr.inputs.push_back({start->commitment(), start->control_authority});
4216  blinding_factors.push_back( start->data.blinding_factor );
4217  total_amount += start->amount;
4218 
4219  if( total_amount >= amount + blind_tr.fee )
4220  break;
4221  }
4222  ++start;
4223  }
4224  for( const auto& u : used )
4225  {
4226  auto itr = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_commitment>().find( u );
4227  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.modify( itr, []( blind_receipt& r ){ r.used = true; } );
4228  }
4229 
4230  FC_ASSERT( total_amount >= amount+blind_tr.fee, "Insufficient Balance", ("available",total_amount)("amount",amount)("fee",blind_tr.fee) );
4231 
4232  auto one_time_key = fc::ecc::private_key::generate();
4233  auto secret = one_time_key.get_shared_secret( to_key );
4234  auto child = fc::sha256::hash( secret );
4235  auto nonce = fc::sha256::hash( one_time_key.get_secret() );
4236  auto blind_factor = fc::sha256::hash( child );
4237 
4238  auto from_secret = one_time_key.get_shared_secret( from_key );
4239  auto from_child = fc::sha256::hash( from_secret );
4240  auto from_nonce = fc::sha256::hash( nonce );
4241 
4242  auto change = total_amount - amount - blind_tr.fee;
4243  fc::sha256 change_blind_factor;
4244  fc::sha256 to_blind_factor;
4245  if( change.amount > 0 )
4246  {
4247  idump(("to_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4248  blinding_factors.push_back( blind_factor );
4249  change_blind_factor = fc::ecc::blind_sum( blinding_factors, blinding_factors.size() - 1 );
4250  wdump(("change_blind_factor")(change_blind_factor) );
4251  }
4252  else // change == 0
4253  {
4254  blind_tr.outputs.resize(1);
4255  blind_factor = fc::ecc::blind_sum( blinding_factors, blinding_factors.size() );
4256  idump(("to_sum_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4257  blinding_factors.push_back( blind_factor );
4258  idump(("nochange to_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4259  }
4260  fc::ecc::public_key from_pub_key = from_key;
4261  fc::ecc::public_key to_pub_key = to_key;
4262 
4263  blind_output to_out;
4264  to_out.owner = to_temp ? authority() : authority( 1, public_key_type( to_pub_key.child( child ) ), 1 );
4265  to_out.commitment = fc::ecc::blind( blind_factor, amount.amount.value );
4266  idump(("to_out.blind")(blind_factor)(to_out.commitment) );
4267 
4268 
4269  if( blind_tr.outputs.size() > 1 )
4270  {
4271  to_out.range_proof = fc::ecc::range_proof_sign( 0, to_out.commitment, blind_factor, nonce, 0, 0, amount.amount.value );
4272 
4273  blind_output change_out;
4274  change_out.owner = authority( 1, public_key_type( from_pub_key.child( from_child ) ), 1 );
4275  change_out.commitment = fc::ecc::blind( change_blind_factor, change.amount.value );
4276  change_out.range_proof = fc::ecc::range_proof_sign( 0, change_out.commitment, change_blind_factor, from_nonce, 0, 0, change.amount.value );
4277  blind_tr.outputs[1] = change_out;
4278 
4279 
4280  blind_confirmation::output conf_output;
4281  conf_output.label = from_key_or_label;
4282  conf_output.pub_key = from_key;
4283  conf_output.decrypted_memo.from = from_key;
4284  conf_output.decrypted_memo.amount = change;
4285  conf_output.decrypted_memo.blinding_factor = change_blind_factor;
4286  conf_output.decrypted_memo.commitment = change_out.commitment;
4287  conf_output.decrypted_memo.check = from_secret._hash[0];
4288  conf_output.confirmation.one_time_key = one_time_key.get_public_key();
4289  conf_output.confirmation.to = from_key;
4290  conf_output.confirmation.encrypted_memo = fc::aes_encrypt( from_secret, fc::raw::pack( conf_output.decrypted_memo ) );
4291  conf_output.auth = change_out.owner;
4292  conf_output.confirmation_receipt = conf_output.confirmation;
4293 
4294  confirm.outputs.push_back( conf_output );
4295  }
4296  blind_tr.outputs[0] = to_out;
4297 
4298  blind_confirmation::output conf_output;
4299  conf_output.label = to_key_or_label;
4300  conf_output.pub_key = to_key;
4301  conf_output.decrypted_memo.from = from_key;
4302  conf_output.decrypted_memo.amount = amount;
4303  conf_output.decrypted_memo.blinding_factor = blind_factor;
4304  conf_output.decrypted_memo.commitment = to_out.commitment;
4305  conf_output.decrypted_memo.check = secret._hash[0];
4306  conf_output.confirmation.one_time_key = one_time_key.get_public_key();
4307  conf_output.confirmation.to = to_key;
4308  conf_output.confirmation.encrypted_memo = fc::aes_encrypt( secret, fc::raw::pack( conf_output.decrypted_memo ) );
4309  conf_output.auth = to_out.owner;
4310  conf_output.confirmation_receipt = conf_output.confirmation;
4311 
4312  confirm.outputs.push_back( conf_output );
4313 
4315  std::sort( blind_tr.outputs.begin(), blind_tr.outputs.end(),
4316  [&]( const blind_output& a, const blind_output& b ){ return a.commitment < b.commitment; } );
4317  std::sort( blind_tr.inputs.begin(), blind_tr.inputs.end(),
4318  [&]( const blind_input& a, const blind_input& b ){ return a.commitment < b.commitment; } );
4319 
4320  confirm.trx.operations.emplace_back( std::move(blind_tr) );
4321  ilog( "validate before" );
4322  confirm.trx.validate();
4323  confirm.trx = sign_transaction(confirm.trx, broadcast);
4324 
4325  if( broadcast )
4326  {
4327  for( const auto& out : confirm.outputs )
4328  {
4329  try { receive_blind_transfer( out.confirmation_receipt, from_key_or_label, "" ); } catch ( ... ){}
4330  }
4331  }
4332 
4333  return confirm;
4334 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from_key_or_label)(to_key_or_label)(amount_in)(symbol)(broadcast)(confirm) ) }

4426 blind_receipt wallet_api::receive_blind_transfer( string confirmation_receipt, string opt_from, string opt_memo )
4427 {
4428  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4429  stealth_confirmation conf(confirmation_receipt);
4430  FC_ASSERT( conf.to );
4431 
4432  blind_receipt result;
4433  result.conf = conf;
4434 
4435  auto to_priv_key_itr = my->_keys.find( *conf.to );
4436  FC_ASSERT( to_priv_key_itr != my->_keys.end(), "No private key for receiver", ("conf",conf) );
4437 
4438 
4439  auto to_priv_key = wif_to_key( to_priv_key_itr->second );
4440  FC_ASSERT( to_priv_key );
4441 
4442  auto secret = to_priv_key->get_shared_secret( conf.one_time_key );
4443  auto child = fc::sha256::hash( secret );
4444 
4445  auto child_priv_key = to_priv_key->child( child );
4446  //auto blind_factor = fc::sha256::hash( child );
4447 
4448  auto plain_memo = fc::aes_decrypt( secret, conf.encrypted_memo );
4449  auto memo = fc::raw::unpack<stealth_confirmation::memo_data>( plain_memo );
4450 
4451  result.to_key = *conf.to;
4452  result.to_label = get_key_label( result.to_key );
4453  if( memo.from )
4454  {
4455  result.from_key = *memo.from;
4456  result.from_label = get_key_label( result.from_key );
4457  if( result.from_label == string() )
4458  {
4459  result.from_label = opt_from;
4460  set_key_label( result.from_key, result.from_label );
4461  }
4462  }
4463  else
4464  {
4465  result.from_label = opt_from;
4466  }
4467  result.amount = memo.amount;
4468  result.memo = opt_memo;
4469 
4470  // confirm the amount matches the commitment (verify the blinding factor)
4471  auto commtiment_test = fc::ecc::blind( memo.blinding_factor, memo.amount.amount.value );
4472  FC_ASSERT( fc::ecc::verify_sum( {commtiment_test}, {memo.commitment}, 0 ) );
4473 
4474  blind_balance bal;
4475  bal.amount = memo.amount;
4476  bal.to = *conf.to;
4477  if( memo.from ) bal.from = *memo.from;
4478  bal.one_time_key = conf.one_time_key;
4479  bal.blinding_factor = memo.blinding_factor;
4480  bal.commitment = memo.commitment;
4481  bal.used = false;
4482 
4483  auto child_pubkey = child_priv_key.get_public_key();
4484  auto owner = authority(1, public_key_type(child_pubkey), 1);
4485  result.control_authority = owner;
4486  result.data = memo;
4487 
4488  auto child_key_itr = owner.key_auths.find( child_pubkey );
4489  if( child_key_itr != owner.key_auths.end() )
4490  my->_keys[child_key_itr->first] = key_to_wif( child_priv_key );
4491 
4492  // my->_wallet.blinded_balances[memo.amount.asset_id][bal.to].push_back( bal );
4493 
4494  result.date = fc::time_point::now();
4495  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.insert( result );
4496  my->_keys[child_pubkey] = key_to_wif( child_priv_key );
4497 
4498  save_wallet_file();
4499 
4500  return result;
4501 }
4502 
4503 vector<blind_receipt> wallet_api::blind_history( string key_or_account )
4504 {
4505  vector<blind_receipt> result;
4506  auto pub_key = get_public_key( key_or_account );
4507 
4508  if( pub_key == public_key_type() )
4509  return vector<blind_receipt>();
4510 
4511  for( auto& r : my->_wallet.blind_receipts )
4512  {
4513  if( r.from_key == pub_key || r.to_key == pub_key )
4514  result.push_back( r );
4515  }
4516  std::sort( result.begin(), result.end(), [&]( const blind_receipt& a, const blind_receipt& b ){ return a.date > b.date; } );
4517  return result;
4518 }
